Le va muy bien ahora, ya que genera buenos ingresos a través de sus múltiples ventas, además de tener tiempo para poder realizar algunas otras actividades. Esta tranquila trabajando ya que sabe que no solo depende de los ingresos de su pareja sino que también ella aporta en la economía del hogar. Espera poder seguir trabajando y lograr así agrandar su negocio para tener mejores ingresos. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete en seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida como en los créditos anteriores que tuvo, además desea seguir trabajando con los socios de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy amables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará abarrotes y otros productos más para implementar mejor a su negocio.
texts.en:
Esther is 31 years old.  She is a kind and friendly woman who lives with her partner.  The couple have three children who are 13, 9 and 6 years old.  Esther and her partner work hard as their wish is to provide their family with a good education and a better quality of life.  The family live together in their own home.  Esther's work is selling groceries from her store which is located in a very busy street in her town.  Many people go there every day in order to locate products which they know they will find there.  Esther's store is located in her home and she has been working there alone for three years.  When she first started out she didn't know anything about the business but she gained experience over the years and was able to learn.  Her business is now doing well and she is able to make good income through her sales.  She also has the time she needs to carry out other activities.

Esther is happy working as she knows that she doesn't depend solely on her partner's income but also contributes to her household finances herself.  She hopes to be able to continue working and to manage to increase her business in order to make better income.

This will be Esther's fourth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue achieving her goals.  For her part, she pledges to continue being punctual in making her repayments as all the members of her community bank are friendly and supportive.  Esther will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy groceries and other products with which to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy more products with which to stock her store

loans.name: Duo Cosechando Bendiciones Group

texts.es: Duo Cosechando vendiciones, este duo esta integrado por dos señoras de las cuales Ingrid Josefina,de 28 años de edad ella nos cuenta que esta muy agradecida con sus padres por aberle apoyado en el negocio,ya que pues es una actividad que le gusta mucho,ella actual mente vende ropa variada como blusas,pantalones,etc, ella lleva ya  varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa variada ya que viene la epoca de fin de año y es cuando mas se vende al igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia para la venta.esperan que fape y kiva les pueda ayudar para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Duo Cosechando Bendiciones. This duo is made up of two women. Ingrid Josefina, of 28 years of age, tells us that she is very grateful to her parents for supporting her in her business, which is an activity she really likes. At the moment she sells a variety of clothes such as blouses, trousers, etc. She has made a living in this activity for several years. 

She is requesting this loan in order to buy a variety of clothes as the end of the year season is coming. This is when she sells the most, as does the other member of the group. She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for resale. They hope that FAPE and Kiva can help them get ahead.

loans.use: to buy varied clothing for resale.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Ledis Esther

texts.es: Ledis desde que recibió su credikiva, su negocio se ha valorizado, tiene mas pedidos y ofrece cursos de manualidades y sus ventas se incrementaron. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva con el cual comprará insumos para elaborar productos en fomí y nuevas herramientas que le ayudan a pulir sus artesanías. Su meta mas adelante es continuar perfeccionando su arte mediante los estudios especializados y alterrnarlo con cursos de gastronomía para ofrecer al mercado,  alimentos a su clientela. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: " Muy agradecidos con los financistas y ojalá sigan apoyándonos para sacar adelante nuestros negocios y hacerlos bien bonitos en el futuro no muy lejano. "
texts.en:
Ever since Ledis got her Kiva loan her business has increased in value; she has more orders, is teaching crafts classes and her sales have increased.  

She is currently applying for her Kiva loan that she’ll use to buy supplies to make foam crafts and to buy new tools that will help her polish her crafts.  

Her goal for later on is to continue perfecting her art through specialized courses that she wants to alternate with cooking classes to offer food to her clientele.  

Her message to lenders is the following: “We are very grateful to the lenders and hope that they will continue supporting us so that we can get ahead with our businesses and make them really pretty in the not too distant future.”

loans.use: to purchase art materials and new tools

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Doña María, habitante de la ciudad de  Estelí, casada, madre de tres hijos todo ellos mayores de edad, ella es comerciante desde muy joven a sus 58  años de edad, es una señora muy activa se dedica a la venta de comida en especial a la venta de  charrasca y chicharrón lleva más de 20 años de dedicarse a este negocio con el cual crio a sus hijos. Al cumplir 30 años de edad fue que decidió solo vender charrasca y chicharrón. 
Ella realizo el crédito para comprar materia prima tales como chicharrón y charrasca para vender al por mayor pues con estos ingredientes se elabora uno de los platillos más típicos y solicitados por la población como lo es el famoso y popular vigoron, así como tortilla con ensalada y chicharrón. Uno de sus planes es comprar un vehículo usado para dedicarse también a la venta y compra de cerdo y mejorar su negocio haciéndolo más rentable para tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
María, an inhabitant of the city of Estelí, is married and is the mother of three grown-up children. She is still a merchant as a 58-year-old, and has been since a young age. She is a very active woman who sells food, in particular churrasco and chicharrón [steak and pork chitterlings]. She has been in this business for over twenty years, which is how she supported her children. It was when she turned thirty that she decided to sell only churrasco and chicharrón.

She requested this loan to buy ingredients like chicharrón and churrasco to sell wholesale. These ingredients are used to make some of the population's most traditional and frequently-ordered dishes like the famous and popular vigorón [Nicaraguan pork dish served with yucca], as well as tortillas with salad and chicharrón. One of her plans is to purchase a used car for buying and selling pork so she can improve her business, making it more profitable so she can have a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as chicharrón and charrasca [pork chitterlings and steak].

loans.name: Galita

texts.es: Galita, de 47 años, es una mujer amable y muy solidaria, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Vive en una casa propia a lado de su pareja con quien comparte sus días trabajando mucho. EL trabajo de Galita consiste en la venta de abarrotes y otros productos en su tienda. Tiene un local acondicionado en su casa en donde acomoda sus productos a la vista de los clientes que van en busca de la variedad de cosas que ofrece. Empezó hace siete años y lo hace sola ya que se siente más cómoda de esta manera. Le agrada mucho lo que hace, pues se divierte y entretiene con sus clientes quienes al momento de ir a comprar se quedan a conversar e intercambian ideas, al principio tuvo algunas dificultades ya que no sabia muy como era el negocio, pero poco a poco fue aprendiendo y ahora tiene las pautas para poder hacer su trabajo sin ninguna dificultad y así complacer en todo lo que necesitan sus clientes. Desea poder ampliar su negocio y tener variedad de cosas para ofrecer, pero sabe que es un proceso largo y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus socios son personas responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mercadería para su tienda ya que necesita tener algunos productos que siempre van a buscar por cantidades.
texts.en:
Galita is 47 years old.  She is a kind and very supportive woman.  She lives with her partner and the couple have three children who are grown up and live independently.  She lives in her own home, alongside her partner, and they spend their days together working hard.  Galita's work consists of selling groceries and other products in her store.  She has a well-equipped store in her home where she displays her products for her customers who come looking for the variety of products that she offers.  Galita started working seven years ago.  She works alone as she feels more comfortable doing this.  She really enjoys what she does as she enjoys herself and is able to spend time with her customers, chat and exchange ideas.  At first she experienced difficulties as she didn't understand the business very well.  However, she gradually learned and now she works with no difficulties.  She is able to satisfy her customers in every way they need.  She would like to expand her business and to have a variety of products to offer.  However, she knows that it is a long process and she is ready to take it on.  

This will be Galita's second loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue reaching her goals.  For her part, she once again pledges to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loan. Galita is happy to belong to her community bank as they are all responsible and supportive people.

Galita will use her 1,500 soles to buy merchandise for her store as she needs some products that her customers come looking for in bulk.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products with which to stock her store

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bernardina; ella tiene 51 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, venta de chicha que es una bebida a base de maíz y también vende gaseosas y cervezas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras y también para comprar maíz para preparar la chicha.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Bernardina, a member of “SAYHUA 3”, a communal bank located in the Urubamba district, in the Urubamba province and in the Cusco department.

Bernardina is 51 years old, she is married and she has 6 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity, selling food and drinks. She sells meals, chicha – a maize-derived fermented beverage – as well as fizzy drinks and beers. She works from 8 am to 5 pm, and thanks to this activity she can provide for her children. Her dream is to improve her meals selling activity. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients to cook her meals such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables, as well as to buy maize to prepare the chicha.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables, and maize to prepare the chicha.

loans.name: Laura Elena

texts.es:
Doña Laura tiene 59 años de edad, desde hace un año y medio se dedica a la venta de abarroteria, su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitacion y gracias a este ha podido sostener a su familia; ya que es madre soltera de cuatro hijos.  

Laura inició vendiendo solo churros, galletas, pan y refrescos pero luego de un tiempo decidió solicitar un prestamo para invertirlo en la compra de mas productos y fue asi como poco a poco fue instalando lo que es ahora su pequeña pulperia.

Ella está solicitando este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mas y variados productos de abarroteria como ser arroz, frijoles, condimentos, pollo, carnes, lacteos, embutidos, pan, refrescos, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este prestamo Laura podrá vender más y sus ganancias seran mejores. 

El mayor deseo de Laura es aumentar sus ventas y de esta forma mejorar la economía de su hogar y llegar a tener un supermercado. Este es su primer préstamo en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Laura is 59 years old, and she has been engaged in running a general store for a hour and a half. Her shop is located in her house and thanks to this activity she has been able to provide for her family, as she is a single mother of four children.

Laura started by selling churros (long fritters made with flour and water), biscuits, brad and drinks only, but after some time she decided to ask for a loan to invest it in the purchase of more products, and so little by little she succeeded in establishing what is now her small corner shop.

She is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of more general products of different kinds such as rice, beans, dressing, chicken, meat, dairy products, sausages, bread and drinks among others. Thanks to the support from this loan Laura will be able to sell more and her income will improve.

Laura’s biggest wishes are to increase her sales and to consequently improve the economy of her household, and to succeed in running a supermarket. This is her first loan with FAMA and she hopes to punctually repay her dues.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, dressing, chicken, meat, dairy products, sausages, bread and drinks.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celsa; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pollos y pescados en el mercado de Urubamba y también la socia vende de crianza de animales como cuyes, pollos y chanchos, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local para que pueda que vender los pollos y pescados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y pescados al por mayor y también para comprar comida para los animales.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Celsa, a member of “SAYHUA 3”, a communal bank located in the Urubamba district, in the Urubamba province and in the Cusco department.

Celsa is 47 years old, she lives with her life partner and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity, selling chickens and fish in the Urubamba market; she also breeds and sells livestock such as “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig), chickens and pigs. Thanks to this activity she can provide for her children. Her dream is to own a shop where to sell chickens and fish. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and fish at wholesale price, as well as to buy animal feed for her animals.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy chickens and fish and tobuy animal feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 50 years old, and lives in the Airport community. She is married, stopped her education in 6th grade, and she has five children between 13 to 33 years old. Three are currently in school and live at home, while the older ones are working and living on their own, and her husband is a businessman. For the past thirteen years she has been selling palm oil in the market. Transporting her goods is the main challenge. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. Her plan is to a build house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase animals for resale.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Susana; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de maíz en el mercado de de Urubamba y también la socia vende frutilla en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de maíz y venta de frutilla. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz y frutilla al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Susana, a member of “SAYHUA 3”, a communal bank located in the Urubamba district, in the Urubamba province and in the Cusco department.

Susana is 41 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity: she buys and sells maize in the Urubamba market, and she also sells strawberries in an itinerant manner. She works form 8 am to 6 pm, and thanks to this activity she can provide for her children. Her dream is to improve her maize and strawberries selling activities. She is requesting a loan to buy maize and strawberries at wholesale price.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy maize and strawberries at wholesale price.

loans.name: Thérèse

texts.fr:
Cliente âgée de 50ans et mariée et mère de 2 enfants est propriétaire d’un restaurant devant son domicile depuis 11ans.
Elle est à son 4eme prêt et elle rembourse toujours avec épargnes.
Ses recettes par jour sont comprises entre 30.000f et 45.000f, les plats qu’elle propose sont vendus à des prix abordables pour permettre que chacun de ses clients trouvent satisfaction.
Avec l’actuel prêt, elle va renforcée son restaurant en achetant :
1panier de poisson fumé, 1carton de poisson salé, 1sac de riz, 10litres d’huile, 1bidon de 10litres d’huile, 1carton de viande arrière, 1sac de charbon, elle va aussi renouveler la série des ustensiles de cuisine pour l’amélioration de son restaurant
C’est une femme qui par son activité contribue à la bonne marche de son foyer et ses enfants son les premiers bénéficiaires.
texts.en: The client, is 50 years old and the mother of two children, who has run a restaurant in front of her house for 11 years.  She is on her fourth loan and has always paid back the previous ones with her savings.  Each day, she takes in between 30,000 and 45,000f.  The dishes that she offers are sold at affordable prices to allow each of her clients to find satisfaction.  With the loan, she is going to reinforce her business by buying: one basket of smoked fish, one tin of salted fish, one bag of rice, a flask of 10 liters of oil, a box of meat, a bag of coal.  She is also going to buy a new set of cooking utensils to improve her restaurant.  Through her business, this woman contributes to the maintenance of her household and her children are the main beneficiaries.

loans.use: to purchase: tins of meat, a basket of smoked fish, a flask of oil, a bag of rice, a string of onions, a tin of salted fish, peanut butter, beans, and tins of tomatoes

loans.name: Lidia Azucena

texts.es: la sra. Lidia tiene 39 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva para dama, caballero y niños, vende jeans, camisas, camisetas, blusas, shorts, calcetines, vestidos y muchas mas prendas de vestir, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa nueva, viene la epoca de navidad y muchas personas compran ropa, desea estar preparada para cubrir con todas las exigencias de sus clientes, ya tiene muchos pedidos y no quiere quedarles mal a todos sus clientes., su negocio esta ubicado en un punto estrategico, ahi transitan muchas personas, esto hace que muchas personas visiten su negocio,  tiene una empleada que le ayuda con la atencion de los clientes.
texts.en: Mrs. Lidia is 39 years old and works selling new clothing for women, men, and children.  She sells jeans, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, shorts, socks, dresses, and many other clothing items.  She will use the loan to buy new clothing.  The Christmas season is approaching and a lot of people buy clothing.  She wants to be prepared for her customers' demands, and she already has a lot of requests and doesn't want her customers to get a bad opinion of her.  Her business is strategically located where a lot of people will pass by.  This makes a lot of people visit her business.  She has one employee who helps her attend to the customers.

loans.use: buy new women's, men's and children's clothing

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 42 years old, and lives in the Airport community. She is married, and she has nine children between 8 to 21 years old. All of them are currently in school and live at home, and her husband is a social worker. For the past twenty years she has been selling rubbers dishes in the market. She enjoys the profit making in the business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes for her business. Her plans are to build her house and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes for her business

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es: Luisa  de 22 años vive en el municipio de Soledad con su padre de actividad conductor viajero. Desde hace 4 años cuando no encontró empleo, Luisa decidió emprender su propio negocio,  donde ofrece servicios de llamadas a celulares y vende meriendas y dulces, en un lugar concurrido de este municipio ubicado en el barrio contiguo a su vivienda. Allí le ha ido muy bien porque tiene dinero para su sustento diario y el pago de costos fijos de su negocio, aunque quiere seguir creciendo, su capital de trabajo se vuelve insuficiente para lograrlo, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará 2 planes más  e invertirá en dulces y meriendas para tener muy bien surtido su negocio. Su mayor desafío es lograr tener un local cerca a su casa y vincular computadores para ofrecer servicios adicionales de informática e ir estructurando una infraestructura elegante y muy formal. Esta es la primera vez que Luisa recibe un crédito y con ello iniciará su historial crediticio como su mejor carta de presentación, porque trabaja disciplinadamente y logra cada día alcanzar sus metas.
texts.en:
Lucia, age 22, lives in the municipality of Soledad with her father, whose business is driving travelers.  After 4 years of unemployment, Luisa decided to begin her own business.  She offers cell phone services (to customers who pay to make calls on her phones) and sells snacks and sweets.  She has a popular spot in the town located in the neighborhood next to her home.  There, she has done very well.  She has money for her daily support and to pay the fixed costs of her business.

She wants to continue increasing her working capital which has become insufficient for her to succeed.  This is the reason why she is seeking her first Kiva loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will invest the loan in purchasing 2 more cell phone plans and in sweets and snacks so that she will have a very well stocked business.  Her greatest challenges are succeeding in having a stand close to her house, obtaining computer links in order to offer additional information service, and putting together a more elegant and formal place of business.

This is the first time Luisa has received a loan.  With it she will establish a credit rating as her best calling card, for she is a disciplined worker and succeeds in reaching her goals each day.

loans.use: to purchase 2 more cell phone plans and invest in sweets and snacks.

loans.name: Ana Leticia

texts.es: Ana Leticia, de 22 años de edad es casada tiene tres hjos,y se dedica a la venta de tortillas los tres tiempos desde hace tres años,nos cuenta que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz y leña por mayor ya que esi se lo dan mas barato,y le que mas ganancia y otro de las cosas nos cuenta que sus clientes han aumentado,le da gracias a Dios por su negocio y le agradese a Fape y kiva por el apoyo que le puedan brindar.
texts.en:
Ana Leticia is 22 years old and married with three children. She makes a living selling tortillas during three seasons and has been doing so for three years. She is asking for a loan to purchase corn and firewood in bulk, as it is cheaper that way and she can make better profits. 

She has reported getting more customers. She thanks God for her business and is grateful to FAPE and Kiva for the support they provide.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood in bulk to make tortillas.

loans.name: Jhim

texts.es: Jhim, de 33 años, es un hombre amable, bueno y trabajador. Convive con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos de 15, 5 y 3 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia y comparten el deseo de poder progresar y sobresalir en lo que hacen. Jhim pasa sus días manejando su taxi moto, no importa si es de día o de noche, él sigue recorriendo las calles en busca de clientes que deseen llegar sanos y seguros a su destino. Su animo es alegre y sus dotes de conversador hacen que los clientes lo busquen para que le haga el servicio. Además que conoce muy bien las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa y siempre brinda un servicio rápido. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es pasear por las calles, además que el trabajo le brinda buenas ganancias y se distrae mucho, aparte de trabajar como mototaxista también trabaja como agente de ventas de una conocida distribuidor de gas de la ciudad. Lleva 6 años realizando este trabajo y aunque es un poco pesado sabe que tiene que realizarlo. Espera más adelante comprar otro mototaxi y hacerlo trabajar para mejor sus ingresos. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete en seguir siendo un cliente puntual y pagar sus cuotas tal como le programen. Esta muy contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará repuestos para su mototaxi que necesita refaccionar ya que por el mal estado de las pistas se deterioro, además pagará al mecánico que le hará el trabajo.
texts.en:
Jhim is 33 years old, and a kind, good, and hard-working man. He lives with his partner and together, they have three children who are 15, 5, and 3 years old. They all live in their own home and share the desire to progress and get ahead through what they do. Jhim spends his days driving his moto-taxi. It does not matter if it is day or night, he keeps on riding along the streets looking for customers who want to arrive safe and sound to their destinations. His happy spirit and conversational gifts make it so the customers look for him to provide transportation service. He also knows the Puccallpa city streets very well and always provides fast service.

His favorite part of his job is traveling the streets, and he also likes that this job provides a good income and is good entertainment. In addition to working as a moto-taxi driver, he also works as a salesman for a well-known gas company in the city. He has worked there for 6 years, and even though it can be a difficult job, he knows he has to do it. In the future, he hopes to buy another moto-taxi and use it to increase his earnings. This will be his fourth loan with MFP, and he is very happy knowing he will have financial support. This way, he feels safe advancing in his work. He is committed to continue being a punctual client by making his payments on time. He is very happy to belong to his community bank because everyone is very responsible and there is a lot of solidarity. With the requested amount of 2000 soles, he will buy parts for his moto-taxi that needs repairs after falling into disrepair from the bad quality of the roads. He will also pay the mechanic to do the repair work for him.

loans.use: buy parts for his motorcycle and hire a mechanic to do the maintenance work

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
la sra. Alba Luz se dedica a la elaboración y venta de rosquillas, quesadillas, tustacas y pan, esta actividad es su única fuente de ingresos, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de sus panes.
doña Alba es madre soltera y vive con sus dos hijos y sus nietos.
Alba desea trabajar muy fuerte en esta navidad, tiene varios pedidos y desea comprar todo al por mayor para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sra. Alba Luz makes and sells doughnuts, quesadillas, corn biscuits and bread. This business is her only source of  income. She will use the loan to buy the ingredients needed to make her breads.

Doña Alba is a single mother and lives with her 2 children and grandchildren.

Alba wants to work hard this Christmas. She has several orders and wants to buy everything in bulk to have better profits.

loans.use: to buy cheese, corn, sugar, eggs, butter and water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase dozens of undergarments, undershorts and bras

loans.name: Julia

texts.en: Julia is 45 years old, lives in Airport community. She is married, and has nine children between ages 19 and 30. Two are currently in school and live at home, while the older ones are working and living on their own. For the past twenty years she has been selling rice, oil, and pepper in the market. She enjoys the profit making in the business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, and pepper for her business. Her plans are to build a house and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, and pepper for her business

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, blusas, polos y chompas, ella vende en las ferias que se realiza en el distrito de Urubamba y también vende comida en el mercado de Urubamba, el sueño de la socia es poder tener un puesto donde pueda vender la ropa y también vender la comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, chompas, polos y blusas al por mayor y también comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, verduras y carne al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, “Sayhua 3.” The bank is located in the Urubamba district, of the Urubamba province and Cusco department. 

The member is Ms. Luz Marina. She is 26 and has a partner and has two children. She alternates her daily activities, one being a business of buying and selling clothing. She sells pants, blouses, polos, and sweaters. She sells in the fairs that take place in the Urubamba district. She also sells food in the Urubamba market. Her dream is to be able to have a stall where she can sell her clothes and also sell food. She requests the loan to purchase wholesale pants, sweaters, polos, and blouses, and also to purchase wholesale ingredients to cook such as chicken, vegetables, meat. 

She is happy to receive the loan and commits to carrying out the payments of the loan.

loans.use: purchase wholesale pants, sweaters, polos, and blouses, as well as wholesale ingredients to cook such as chicken, vegetables, meat.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa de 66 años de edad vive al sur occidente de la ciudad, con su esposo y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 32 y 40 años. Allí se dedica a la venta de bebidas frías, desde hace aproximadamente 10 años;  ella en su casa vende cervezas y refrescos, que almacena en un botellero de 500 unidades, a clientes que lo compran para ser consumidos en su lugar de residencias. Su meta es lograr ampliar su negocio y ofrecer un servicio siempre oportuno a su clientela. En la actualidad se acercó a la Fundación Maro Santo Domingo, para solicitar su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a esta organización,  con el que comprará bebidas para enfriar y vender en la etapa más festiva y familiar del año, las navidades y el año nuevo. Su sueño es convertirse en proveedora de tiendas y pequeños negocios, que usualmente se quedan sin inventarios y deben esperar el vehículo de reparto semana a semana, para responder a sus clientes. Así mismo mediante su trabajo espera más adelante mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y sentirse confortable con todo lo que Dios le ha dado.
texts.en:
Rosa, 66, lives to the southwest of the city with her husband, and has two children, ages 32 and 40.  There she has worked selling cold drinks for approximately 10 years.  In her house she sells beer and soft drinks, which she stores in a 500-unit bottle rack, to customers who buy it to drink in their homes.  Her goal is to manage to expand her business and always offer her customers a timely service.

Currently she approached Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to request a Kiva loan, the first funding she has requested from this organization.  With it she will buy drinks to chill and sell in the most festive and family-oriented season of the year, Christmas and New Year.

Her dream is to become a supplier for stores and small businesses (which usually end up without inventory and have to wait for the weekly distribution), to be able to meet the demand of her customers.  She also hopes through this work to improve her living conditions in the future and to feel more comfortable with what God has given her.

loans.use: to buy drinks to chill and sell.

loans.name: Valmir

texts.en:
After moving from Brazil 10 years ago, Valmir started working part-time informally cleaning houses and decided to make a home-based business out of it. Since the recession started, Valmir has struggled financially and no banks would lend to him despite his good credit history in the past. Besides the cleaning business, he has two part-time jobs and is working to give his family a better future. He heard about Accion USA through a local paper and decided to call—now he’s happy he did because the business is getting the cash flow it needs in order to formalize it. Valmir hopes to build his business and make it successful again.

This loan will help Valmir pay for new cleaning supplies and purchase more commercial and residential cleaning contracts. It will help him expand his clientele and offer better services to the community.

loans.use: To pay for additional cleaning supplies and new contracts.

loans.name: Manuel Alberto

texts.es:
Manuel trabajador, mejorar las condiciones de la infraestructura de su vivienda sigue siendo su principal plan.  Mediante el financiamiento a logrado ir cambiando algunos desperfectos de su casa. Con este nuevo ciclo de crédito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales como: cemento bond, porcelana, separadores, látex entre otros materiales que se requieren para la colocación de baldosa del suelo de su casa. Obteniendo un mejor aspecto su vivienda y contribuyendo a un mejor nivel de vida. 
Agradece a ala financiera por el apoyo y la ayuda a cumplir sus planes y proyectos.
texts.en:
Manuel is a worker whose main plan continues to be improving the conditions of his home's infrastructure. With financing he has been able to make changes to some of his house's imperfections. He will use a new round of credit to buy materials like grout, porcelain, dividers and latex, among other materials required for laying tile on the floor of his house. 

This improves his home and contributes to a better standard of living. He thanks the lender for their support and help in accomplishing his plans and projects.

loans.use: to buy materials for laying tile on his floor.

loans.name: Jimena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jimena; ella tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatos, accesorios de zapatos y también arregla zapatos, ella tiene una tienda en el distrito de Urubamba que vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia quiere ahorrar para poder estudiar, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos y repuestos de zapatos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Sayhua 3 communal bank, located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.  The member, Jimena, is 19 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling shoes and shoe accessories, and she also repairs shoes.  She has a store in the Urubamba district where she sells from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  Through this small business she wants to save to be able to study.  Her dream is to expand her business selling shoes.

She is requesting the loan to buy shoes and shoe parts wholesale.

Jimena is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes and shoe parts wholesale.

loans.name: Katy  Belen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Katy Belen; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de juguetes, ella vende carros, muñecas y todo tipo de juguetes, ella tiene un puesto en el mercado, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender los juguetes zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar juguetes al por mayor.   
                                                               
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Sayhua 3 communal bank, located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

The member is Katy Belén.  She is 23 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling toys.  She sells cars, dolls, and all types of toys.  She has a stall in the market.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell toys.

She is requesting the loan to buy toys wholesale.
                                                               
She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy toys wholesale.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz, de 67 años, es una mujer buena y amable, esta casada y tiene tres hijos, quienes ya son mayores e independientes, pero vive a lado de su hija en su casa propia desde donde trabaja todos los días y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. EL trabajo de Beatriz consiste en la venta al por menor de bebidas heladas, entre los productos que ofrece son gaseosas de todas las marcas y presentaciones, además de bebidas alcohólicas que solo vende a personas mayores de edad. Lleva realizando este trabajo por cuatro años, lo hace sola  y en su casa. Cuando comenzó con este trabajo vendía solo gaseosas chicas en vidrio, además de algunos helados y hielo, ahora creció de a poco y vende en mayor cantidad y con mejores resultados ya que le esta yendo muy bien y genera buenos ingresos. Cuando no hacia este tipo de negocio en su casa, algunas veces tenía problemas en su economía ya que solo dependía del ingreso que podría traer su esposo, pero con su propio negocio pudo empezar a disponer de sus propios ingresos. Esta muy contenta y desea mantenerse por el momento y mas adelante poner una fuente de soda. Este será el crédito número 12 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un respaldo financiero ya que le dará la garantía de seguir trabajando tranquila. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará bebidas en mayor cantidad y asi poder ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Beatriz, 67, is a good and pleasant woman.  She is married but she has three children who are already grown and independent, but she lives with her daughter in her own house from where she works every day and so is able to improve her quality of life.

Beatriz's job consists of selling cold drinks wholesale.  Among the products she sells are all brands and sizes of soda as well as alcoholic beverages that she sells only to adults.  She has been doing this work for four years.  She does it alone and in her house.  When she began with this work she sold only small sodas in glass bottles as well as some ice cream and ice.  Gradually she grew and now she sells wholesale and with better results, since it is going very well for her and it generates good income.

When she was not doing this kind of work at home, sometimes she had financial problems because she depended only on the income her husband was able to bring home, but with her own business she began to have her own income at her disposal.  She is very happy and wants to get by for the moment and later install a soda fountain.

This will be her twelfth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial help because this will give her the guarantee of continuing to work peacefully.

With the requested loan of 1000 PEN she will buy drinks wholesale to be able to offer more variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sodas and beer.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Con su nuevo credikiva Gloria surtirá su tienda, con la mercancia de mas salida comoercial para el fin del año, como bebidas, refrecos y abarrotes principalemente. Ella está muy satisfecha porque con su credikiva adecuó el piso y la cubierta de su terraza locativa,  donde hoy ofrece un ambiente confortable a sus clientes. Su mensaje para los financiadores es el siguiente: " Austedes les agradezco mucho su ayuda y espero que sigan ayudando para que mi negocio sea mas grande y próspero. "
texts.en:
Gloria will use her new Kiva loan to stock her store with the merchandise that moves quickly for the end of the year.  She will mainly stock up on things like soft drinks and groceries.

She is very happy because she used her Kiva loan to finish the flooring and the covering of her patio where she now offers her customers a comfortable setting.  

Her message to the lenders is the following:  “I am very grateful for your help, I hope you continue helping so that my business will be bigger and prosperous.”

loans.use: to buy food, groceries, and drinks.

loans.name: Yonny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yonny; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes platos como pollo al horno, estofado de pollo, carne a la parrilla entre otros platos, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y comidas, ella tiene un puesto en el mercado, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant y poder cocinar los diferentes platos típicos de la ciudad de Cusco. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras.
                                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Sayhua 3 communal bank, located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

The member is Yonny.  She is 35 years old and single, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling food.  She prepares different dishes such as baked chicken and grilled meat, among others.  She makes breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  She has a stall in a market.  Her dream is to have a restaurant and be able to cook different typical dishes of the city of Cusco.

Yonny is requesting the loan to buy cooking products such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy cooking products such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Duo Las Victorias Group

texts.es:
Dúo las victorias
Doña Santa Victoria Jacobo y doña Silvia Elizabeth son personas trabajadoras que gracias a dios su negocio a crecido bastante,doña santa vistoria es la lider del grupo se dedica a la elaboración  de suéteres en su casa desde hace 10 años es por eso que nos esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de sueteres  doña sandra se dedica a la venta de refacción en el mercado municipal de la  localidad  gracias al esfuerzo de ellas han podido sacar adelante a su familia y darles una educación, bajo su responsabilidad están sus hijos que  solo quieren lo mejor para ellos, ellas empezaron con un pequeño negocio y con el transcurso de los días ha podido crecer bastante y ahora ya son conocidas por sus clientes por el buen trabajo que ellas hacen, hoy en dia le hacen encargos de suéteres por docena, y también les  encargan refacciones de entrega en actividades especiales, lamentablemente ellas no cuenta con suficiente capital para poder comprar  materia para elaborarlos los pedidos que le hacen, por eso necesitan un capital para poder engrandar mas su negocio y obtener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
"Dúo las victorias" [The Victorious Duo]

Santa Victoria Jacobo and Silvia Elizibeth are hardworking people that, thanks to God, their business has grown greatly. Santa Victoria is the leader of the group and she makes a living making sweaters in her house. She has been doing this for ten years. It is for this that she is requesting this loan from us, to buy raw materials to make sweaters. Sandra makes a living selling snacks in the municipal market in town. 

Thanks to their efforts they have helped their families to get ahead and have given them an education. Under their responsibility are their children, who they only want the best for. They started with a small business and over the course of time have been able to grow greatly. Now they are known by their customers for the good work that they do. Now they are commissioned for sweaters by the dozen. They are also commissioned to provide snacks for special events. Unfortunately, they do not have enough capital to be able to by the materials they need to make the orders that have been made. For this they need capital to be able to grow their business and make more profits.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make sweaters.

loans.name: Warren

texts.es: Warren, de 27 años, es un hombre bueno, y trabajador, es soltero y aun no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus padres a quienes apoya en la parte económica y por quienes trabaja a diario para brindarles la comodidad que ellos merecen. El trabajo de Warren consiste en el transporte de carga y pasajero dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Desde muy temprano sale en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros a quienes recoge de las calles más concurridas de la ciudad y los transporta a los destinos que ellos solicitan. Lleva trabajando de mototaxista por cuatro años, durante este período de tiempo aprendió muchas cosas que al principio no sabia y a veces le hacían perder pasajeros, ahora todos los días aprende algo nuevo y trabaja mucho para que pueda seguir generando ingresos a su hogar. Le va muy bien ya que durante las 10 horas que esta en la calle sabe a donde ir en que horarios ir, además que algunas veces agarra contratos por hora y eso le conviene aún más. Espera seguir haciendo su trabajo con la normalidad que lo hizo ahora y empezar a ahorrar para comprar una nueva mototaxi. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por su parte se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además se siente muy a gusto trabajando con sus compañeros de banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, aportará algo a su ahorro para comprarse un mototaxi más y revalidará la documentación para su vehiculo ya que están por vencer, además de comprar algunas piezas y repuestos para su moto ya que con el tiempo se han deteriorado.
texts.en:
Warren, 27, is a good and hardworking man.  He is single and does not have children yet.  He lives in his parents' home, and supports them financially and works daily to give them the comfort they deserve.

Warren's job consists of cargo and passenger transportation within and outside the city.  He goes out very early in search of his eventual passengers, whom he picks up in the busiest streets of the city and transports to the locations they request.  He has worked as a motorcycle taxi driver for four years.  During this time he has learned many things he did not know at the beginning and sometimes made him lose passengers.  Now he learns something new every day and he works a lot so he can continue generating income for his home.  It is going very well for him because during the 10 hours he is in the street he knows where to go and when.  Besides, sometimes he gets hourly contracts and this is even better for him.

He hopes to continue doing his work as normally as he has done it, and to begin to save to buy a new motorcycle taxi.  This will be his second loan with MFP, and he hopes for your collaboration so he can realize his plans.  For his part, he is committed once again to making his payments just as with the previous loans he had.  He also feels very comfortable working with his companions from the communal bank because all are very responsible and supportive.

With the requested loan of 1500 PEN he will contribute something to his savings to buy himself a motorcycle taxi, he will renew his papers for his vehicle since they are about to expire, and he also will buy some parts and spare parts for his motorcycle because they have been damaged over time.

loans.use: to update his vehicle permit papers, to buy spare parts, and to help pay for a new vehicle.

loans.name: Bandu

texts.en: Bandu is 31 years old and lives in Airport community. She is married and she has three children between the ages of 4 and 20 years old, all of which are currently in school and live at home. For the past nineteen years she has been selling palm oil and dried meat in the market. She enjoys the way customers respond to her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil and dried meat for her business. Her plan is to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and dried meat for her business.

loans.name: Manie

texts.en: Mamie is 32 years old and lives in Airport community. She is married with four children between the ages of 7 and 15 years old, two of which are currently in school. All of her children live at home. Her husband is a security man and for the past eight years she has been operating a salon in her community. She enjoys the flow of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more artificial hair, hair spray, and supplies for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair, hair spray, and supplies for her business.

loans.name: José Dante

texts.es:
El señor José Dante esta agradecido por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual a podo salir adelante con su negocio. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercancía por medio de un catalogo que es perfumes de hombre y mujer y productos de belleza. Y así tener más ganancias a su negocio y a su familia.
texts.en:
Señor José Dante is grateful for your cooperation with his earlier loan, with which he has been able to progress his business.

He is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise from a catalog: perfumes for men and women, and beauty products.  In this way he will earn more for his business and his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise from a catalog.

loans.name: Leny

texts.es: La señora Leny nacida en Galilea - Santa Cruz, hace 27 años convive con el señor Rolando  con el cual tienen 2 hijos, el para trabajando fuera de casa por temporadas largas y la señora Leny tiene un negocio de venta de ropa desde hace 1 año y medio, donde ella vende toda la semana y su mayor ganancia son sábados y domingos, y de esta manera colabora con los gastos del hogar,  el crédito que solicita lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercadería de ropa para ampliar el negocio, ropa de temporada ya que por estas fiestas de fin de año tiene mucha demanda de ropa y tiene mucha clientela, y se encuentra con muchos pedidos que tiene que entregar, la Sra. Leny es una persona muy amable y trabajadora que tiene que dedicarse al cuidado de sus hijos y de su negocio ya que con esta actividad solventa los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Señora Leny was born in Galilea in Santa Cruz.  She is 27 years old and lives with Señor Rolando, with whom she has two children.  He works away from home for long periods of time, and Señora Leny has had her business selling clothing for the last year and a half.  She sells throughout the week and her best earnings are on Saturdays and Sundays.  In this this way she contributes to covering the household expenses.

The loan that she is requesting will be invested in purchasing clothing merchandise to expand her business; it will be seasonal clothing, as the at the holidays at the end of the year, there is great demand for clothing and she get many customers and many orders that she must meet.

Señora Leny is a very friendly and hard-working person who must look after her children and her business, as with this activity she covers the household expenses.

loans.use: to expand further her business selling clothing.

loans.name: Teresa María

texts.es:
Teresa es una persona sociable, tranquila, le gusta demostrar una sonrisa para mejorar su atención al cliente y así mejorar sus ventas. Teresa tiene 10 hijos, vive con su esposo en la ciudad de Ibarra que se encuentra al Norte de Ecuador.

Teresa trabaja con un hijo en la compra venta de juegos de sábanas, negocio que le ayuda a cubrir las necesidades diarias de su familia, al momento quiere incrementar sus productos ya que se viene la temporada navideña y en esta temporada podrá incrementar sus ventas considerablemente, proceso que ayudará a mejorar la calidad de vida de los suyos. Es el primer crédito que realiza a Fodemi el mismo que invertirá en la compra de juegos de sábanas para posteriormente venderlos.

Su sueño es poder comprar un carro para distribuir junto con otro hijo.
texts.en:
Teresa is a sociable and easygoing person. She likes to greet customers with a smile in order to provide better service and therefore increase her sales. Teresa has ten children and lives with her husband in the town of Ibarra, northern Ecuador.
Teresa works with one of her sons in buying sheets sets for selling. This business helps her pay for her family's daily needs. At the moment she wishes to stock up on merchandise, since the holiday season is coming and during this time she will be able to considerably increase her sales. This will help improve the living conditions of her loved ones. This is her first loan with Fodemi and she will use it to purchase sheets sets for selling later.
Her dream is to purchase a car to distribute merchandise along with another one of her sons.

loans.use: to purchase sheets sets in order to increase business and profit from the holiday season.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
Nelson forma parte del Banco comunal “Ilusión 2011” perteneciente a la ciudad de Viña del Mar.
Se dedica al rubro del comercio, específicamente vendiendo provisiones en un local que adaptó en el garaje de su casa.
Se desempeña en éste negocio desde hace 1 año y 6 meses. Trabaja de lunes a domingo durante 12 horas diarias.
Su mercadería la compra a mayoristas, distribuidoras y también proveedores. 
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para abastecer su negocio.
Sus metas son expandirse con su negocio y que éste prospere, así surtirlo con nueva y mayor cantidad de mercadería. 
Nelson vive junto a su madre y uno de sus sueños son comprarse un vehículo y adquirir su vivienda propia. 
El está muy contento y agradecido de la ayuda que le ha brindado Fondo esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio.
Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal al cual pertenece, comenta que es un grupo muy unido, comprometido y responsable.
Por otro lado las capacitaciones le han servido para organizar la contabilidad de su negocio de mejor manera. 
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en: Nelson is a member of the "Ilusión 2011" communal bank from the town of Viña del Mar. He is in sales, more specifically selling groceries in a store adapted in the garage of his home. He has been in this business for one year and six months. He works 12 hours a day from Monday through Sunday. He buys his merchandise from wholesale sellers, distributors and suppliers. With the loan he will purchase merchandise in order to stock up his store. His goals are to expand his business and to see it prosper, and so he needs to stock up with more and newer merchandise. Nelson lives with his mother and one of his dreams is to purchase a vehicle and also a house of his own. He is very happy and thankful for the help he has been given by Fondo Esperanza, because it has allowed him to invest in his business. As for the communal bank he belongs to, he reports that it is a very united, committed and responsible group. Also, the trainings have been useful for him to organize accounting for his business in the best possible way. Viña del Mar is a town and commune located in the central coast of Chile. It is known as the Garden Town due to the gardens and yards belonging to some of the town's old houses. It is also considered to be Chile's tourism capital.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock up his store.

loans.name: Yony

texts.es: Yony, de 49 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 33 y 5 años, el mayor es independiente mientras que el menor vive con ella y es la razón para que día a día trabaje mucho ya que desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Yony consiste en realizar trabajos de costura, realiza diseños propios y los vende; asimismo compone prendas. Tiene un pequeño taller en su casa en donde espera todos los días que lleguen sus clientes quienes les son fieles, pues hace un bueno trabajo además de tener un acabo perfecto y algunos detalles muy significativos. Lleva realizando esta actividad por 34 años y esta muy feliz de poder generar ingresos con algo que le gusta hacer tanto. AL principio cuando se inicio, no sabia muy bien algunas técnicas pero con el tiempo fue aprendiendo. Ahora con 34 años de experiencia es toda una maestra y por eso es que tiene muchos clientes a veces que esperan para que les pueda atender sus pedidos. Tiene como proyecto el poder ampliar su negocio y así poder satisfacer a todos sus clientes. Este será el segundo cerdito con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero ya que le permitirá estar mas tranquila y avanzar con sus planes de su negocio. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará materiales para seguir con su trabajo, además comprará una maquina remmalladora para dar mejor acabado a sus creaciones.
texts.en: 49-year-old Yoni is a good and kindhearted woman. She lives with her partner with whom she has two children aged 33 and 5. The older one is independent. The younger one lives with her and is the reason why she works hard every day, since she wants to provide her child with better living conditions. Yoni's work is sewing. She designs her own products and sells them, and also makes jewelry. She has a small shop in her home where every day she waits for her customers to arrive. Her clientele is faithful because she does good work and, besides, she has perfect finish and very significant detailing. She has been in this business for 34 years and she is very happy to be able to get an income from something she so enjoys doing. When she first started, she didn't know some techniques very well, but in time she learned them. Now, with 34 years of experience, she is a master and that is why she has so many customers who sometimes wait until she can take their orders. She has a project of expanding her business so that she can satisfy all of her customers. This will be her second loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she will get financial support, since it will allow her to be more relaxed and go ahead with her business plan. With the requested amount of 1.200 soles she will purchase supplies in order to keep working. She will also purchase an overlock sewing machine so she can give better finish to her creations.

loans.use: to purchase an overlock sewing machine and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Berniece

texts.es:
La señora Berniece, tiene 53 años de edad, madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 17, 29, 30 y 35 años de edad, vive en la colonia las Torres, Choloma, Cortes.

Hace 20 años que doña Berniece se dedica a la elaboración y venta de espejos con marco de aluminio de varios tamaños,  de 2x3 pulgadas hasta 8x10 pulgadas.
Ella es muy trabajadora a este negocio le dedica 10 horas diarias.  Distribuye este producto a clientes fijos que tienen negocios en el mercado local.
Para mantener este negocio a solicitado financiamiento a ODEF, este préstamo es el numero 48 y es para invertir en materia prima como compra de vidrio, aluminio y alambre para elaborar espejos.
Con  las ganancias a logrado darle educación básica a sus hijos, también esta motivada por ampliar el negocio y aumentar los ingresos para reparar  su casa.
texts.en:
Berniece, 53, is a single mother.  She has four children who are 17, 29, 30 and 35 years old.  She lives in the Las Torres neighborhood in Choloma, Cortes.

Berniece has been making and selling aluminum framed mirrors in various sizes from 2x3 inches to 8x10 inches for the last twenty years.  She is very hardworking and spends ten hours per day at work.  She sells her products to regular customers that have businesses in the local market.

To stay in business she’s requested financing from ODEF.  This is loan #48 and it will be used to buy raw materials like glass, aluminum and wire to make mirrors.

With profits earned she managed to provide basic education for her children.  She’s also motivated to enlarge the business and increase income in order to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like glass, aluminum and wire to make mirrors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase provisions and goods to prepare food.

loans.name: Diana Marcela

texts.es: La señora Diana a sus 23 años de edad es madre de dos hijos, uno de ellos tiene dos años y el otro esta recién nacido con 5 meses de edad.  La señora Diana es una emprendedora quien desea iniciar su propio negocio de venta de mercancía principalmente ropa interior para dama, esta labor la realizara en paralelo con su empleo de operaria de confección. La señora Diana requiere de la compra de surtido para iniciar su negocio y suplir la demanda de fin de año. Con lo anterior, podrá mejorar sus ingresos y así apoyar económicamente a su esposo con los gastos familiares. El sueño de la señora Diana es ver crecer a sus hijos y brindarles una excelente educación.
texts.en:
Diana, at 23 years old, is the mother of two children. One of them is two years old and the other one is a new-born, five months old. Diana is an enterprising woman who hopes to start her own business selling merchandise - mainly women's underwear - which she will do in parallel with her job as a textile worker.

Diana needs to purchase inventory to start her business and meet the end-of-year demand. With this business she hopes to improve her income and therefore economically help her husband with family expenses. Her dream is to see her children grow up and provide them with an excellent education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as underwear.

loans.name: Astrid Evelyn

texts.es:
La señora Astrid Evelyn es casada tiene dos hijos, su esposo es quien trabaja en una agencia aduanal como tramitador, actualmente esta embarazada y pronto de que llegue su bebe, necesita tener pagada los gastos médicos y la clínica. Es por eso que solicita un préstamo para liquidar y que la llegada del bebe no tenga ningún problema. 
Doña Astrid Evelyn esta agradecida por el crédito anterior, ya que pudo liquidar los gastos escolares de sus hijos, y espera contar con su cooperación para este crédito que es para la llegada se su tercer hijo.
texts.en:
Astrid Evelyn is married and has two children. Her husband works as a claims administrator for a customs agency. She is currently pregnant and as soon as her baby arrives, her medical expenses and the clinic must be paid for. That is why she requests a loan, so she can pay for them and so the baby's arrival has no problems at all.
Astrid Evelyn is thankful for the previous loan, because she was able to pay for her children's school expenses. She hopes she can count on your cooperation for this loan, which is for the arrival of her third child.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses at the clinic where her child will be born.

loans.name: Juana Adorita

texts.es:
Juana es una madre soltera que vive en Atuntaqui con su pequeño hijo de 10 años y con su madre de 67 años quien trabaja vendiendo frutas en el mercado de la localidad. Atuntaqui es una ciudad de 21 000 habitantes ubicada en la provincia de Imbabura, en la región norte de Ecuador. Aunque el nombre propio del sector es Antonio Ante, quienes lo visitan o han escuchado hablar de él lo identifican más como Atuntaqui, nombre de varios significados a través de la historia. Históricamente, Antonio Ante tiene mucho que ofrecer, el turista puede visitar Pailatola, Orozcotola y Pupotola, las tolas más representativas de la provincia, para descubrir los monumentos fúnebres construidos por los 'Atuntaqui'.

Juana tiene un taller de confección de ropa que lo aprendió de su anterior trabajo ya que era obrera en un centro textilero de la ciudad. Trabaja sola desde hace algunos años y ha decidido invertir en materia prima e insumos. Es su primer crédito y ella tiene mucha fe en que su negocio va a crecer con esta inversión. A pesar de una enfermedad alérgica ella trabaja diariamente una jornada de 12 horas. Sueña con tener mejor maquinaria y dar trabajo a las personas de su comunidad. Su gran meta es construir una casa donde podrá vivir con su familia
texts.en:
Juana is a single mother who lives with her 10 year old little boy in Atuntaqui.  She and her 67 year old mother sell fruit at the local market.  Atuntaqui is a city with 21,000 inhabitants, located in the Imbabura province, in the northern region of Ecuador.  Although the proper name of the sector is Antonio Ante, those who visit or have spoken about it identify it more as Atuntaqui, a name of varying historical significance.  Historically, Antonio Ante has had much to offer.  Tourists can visit Pailatola, Orozcotola, and Pupotola, the province’s most representative tombs, to describe funeral monuments built by the “Atuntaqui.”

Juana has a tailor shop where she makes clothes.  She learned this at her previous job where she worked at the city’s central textile factory.  She’s been independent for a few years and has decided to invest in supplies and materials.  This will be her first loan and she has a lot of faith that her business will grow with this investment.  She works 12 hours a day despite an allergy.  She hopes to have a better sewing machine and give jobs to the people in her community.  Her greatest goal is to build a house where she can live with her family.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.es: La señora Maria Patricia es madre de un hijo de 15 años de edad, hace varios años se separó de su esposo; con el fin de generar los ingresos para su familia, la señora Maria Patricia inició hace tres años su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de empanadas en colegios y restaurantes, la empanada es un producto a base de masa de maíz y relleno con carne, pollo, papa y arroz. Con el tiempo, la señora Maria Patricia inicia con un nuevo negocio de vender sus empanadas precosidas y su producto terminado ofrecerlo en un local de su propiedad junto con alguna bebida liquida como gaseosa o café. Actualmente, la señora Maria Patricia trabaja en su local con dos hermanas quienes le colaboran desde las 8.30 a.m hasta las 7:30 p.m. La señora Maria Patricia requiere de la compra de materia prima que le permita elaborar sus productos, mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos y con esto la calidad de vida de su familia. El sueño de la señora Maria Patricia es tener otro local y en este emplear por lo menos a 10 personas.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Patricia is a single mother with one child: a 15 year-old son. She separated from her husband a few years ago.  With the goal of generating income for her family she started her own business 3 years ago.  She makes and sells empanadas - a corn based tort filled with chicken, potatoes and rice - to schools and restaurants.  

Having had success with her initial business, the Señora Maria Patricia started a new business selling pre-made empanadas and offering them in a store along beverages such as sodas and coffee.  She works with her two sisters each day from 8:30am until 7:30 pm. La señora  Maria Patricia is in need of a loan in order to purchase raw materials that will allow her to make more products, improve her sales and increase her income, thus improving the quality of life of her family.  Maria Patricia's dream is to open an additional location where she can employ at least 10 people.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials such as corn, vegetables and oil.

loans.name: Neida

texts.es: La Sra. Neida  se dedica  a la venta de comida, vive en la zona de el Recreo, ella tiene 42 años y tiene un hijo, su esposo el Sr. Juan  tiene 46 años, el le ayuda con la venta de comida, venden los siguientes platos  como ser  locro, parrillada, chuleta, elabora variedad de plato, venden a dos cuadras de su casa,  hace tres años que se dedica a esta actividad sus deseos son de superación  para así brindarles  a su hijo un futuro mejor, con el dinero del crédito comprara un frízer y refrescos para su negocio,  tiene el deseo de tener su propio restaurante y atender a mas clientes, trabajan mucho ya que es su única fuente de ingreso, La Sra. Neida es una persona responsable y se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Neida sells food.  She lives in the El Recreo zone.  She’s 42 years old and has a son.  Her husband, Juan, is 46 years old and he helps her with the food sales.  They sell the following dishes: locro [stew], parrillada [grilled meat], chuleta [chops].  She prepares a variety of dishes and they sell two blocks from home.  She’s been in this line of work for three years and she hopes to get ahead to provide a better future for her son.  She will use the money from the loan to buy a freezer and soft-drinks for her business.  She hopes to have her own restaurant and to tend to more customers.  They work a lot because it’s their only source of income.  Neida is a responsible person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, soft-drinks and juice.

loans.name: Veronica Alexandra

texts.es:
Verónica es una persona alegre, trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora que le gusta salir adelante en su trabajo. Verónica tiene 27 años, vive con su hija de 10 años en Ibarra al norte de Ecuador.

Verónica trabaja con su hermana en la venta ambulante de ropa interior, trabajo que les trae muchos problemas por no tener un local propio y lo tienen que hacer ya que la necesidad por cubrir los gastos de sus hijos es mas grande. Es su primer crédito con Fodemi el mismo que va a invertir en la compra de mas mercadería ya que en temporada navideña aumentan las ventas e ingresos para ella y su hija que necesita estudiar.

Las aspiraciones que tiene para un futuro es administrar su local propio de ropa interior, ya que le resulta difícil vender solo en las ferias ya que tiene que llevar varios bultos.
texts.en:
Verónica is a cheerful, hardworking, responsible and enterprising person who likes to get ahead in her work.  She’s 27 years old and lives with her 10-year-old daughter in Ibarra in northern Ecuador.

Verónica works with her sister as an itinerant clothing merchant, a job that is fraught with many problems because of the lack of a locale of her own.  They have to do it, though, because the need to cover their children’s needs is greater.  This is her first Fodemi loan and she will use it to buy more merchandise because during the Christmas season sales and income increase for her and her daughter who needs to go to school.

Her hope for the future is to run her own underwear store because it’s difficult for her to sell only in the street markets because she has to carry several bundles.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maura; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es conviviente y compra  tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida y también la socia vende relojes y radios, ella vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el sueño de la socia es tener un local para poder vender la comida y los relojes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar relojes y productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras. 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maura, 50, is a member of the “Sayhua 3” communal bank that’s located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.  

She has a spouse and four children.  She alternates her daily chores with a food-selling business; she also sells watches and radios in Urubamba’s market from 8am until 6pm.  Her dream is to have a locale to sell food and watches.  She’s asking for the loan to buy watches and ingredients to prepare food like rice, meat, chicken and vegetables.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy watches and ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: Ricardo De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Ricardo a los 68 años de edad es padre de 9 hijos, se dedica a la venta de dulces y snacks a la salida de un colegio del municipio de Marinilla localizado al oriente de Antioquia, esta labor la realiza desde hace 9 años en un pequeño carro ambulante de manera que adecuo para ubicar sus productos. El señor Ricardo requiere de la compra de surtido para su puesto de venta de dulces con el fin de poder incrementar sus ventas y así mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida. El sueño del señor Ricardo es poder tener su negocio más amplio y con mayor variedad de productos.
texts.en: Richard, sixty-eight years old, is the father of nine children. He makes a living selling candy and snacks outside a school in the municipality of Marinilla, in the east of Antioquia. He has done this work for the last nine years using a street cart that he adapted to hold his products. Richard needs to purchase stock for his candy stand in order to increase his sales and therefore increase his income and quality of life. Richard's dream is to be able to expand his business and offer a larger variety of products.

loans.use: to purchase his stock of candy.

loans.name: Judith Clementina

texts.es:
Judith  Clementina, tiene 46 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de edades entre 18 y 30 años, vive en la colonia, Miramonte, Cofradia, Cortes.
Doña Judith, tiene un negocio donde vende comidas y golosinas  como churros, confites, refrescos  y  naranjas.  Hace 8 meses inicio este negocio con capital propio, anteriormente vendía solo  tortillas.
Este préstamo es el segundo  que solicita a ODEF, y es  para invertir en su negocio en compra de carnes, vegetales, verduras,  condimentos etc. para elaborar comida y golosinas como  churros, refrescos y  dulces para la venta.
Ella esta motivada en terminar de construir su local específicamente para el negocio de comida y golosinas.
texts.en:
Judith Clementina, 46, is a single mother.  She has four children whose ages range from 18 to 30.  She lives in the Miramonte neighborhood in Cofradía, Cortes.

Judith has a business where she sells food and snacks like churros, sweets, soft-drinks and oranges.  She started the business 8 months ago with her own capital; she used to just sell tortillas.

This is the second loan request to ODEF and it’s to be used to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, etc. to prepare meals and to buy snacks like churros, soft-drinks and candy to sell.  She’s motivated to finish building her locale specifically to sell food and snacks.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food and also to buy snacks, candy and soft-drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy candies, snacks, and other items.

loans.name: Carmen Olga

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAYHUA 3”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.
