They produce butter and cheese and sell them, along with beef and lamb, in their village. Farming allows Vachik to provide for his family and support his children’s families as well. Vachik intends to develop his farm, so he is seeking a 1,100,000 AMD loan to buy 3 more cows for his farm. This will allow Vachik to produce more butter and cheese and thus to increase his family’s income in the future.

loans.use: to buy 3 more cows for his farm

loans.name: Lemashon

texts.en:
Lemashon, 26 years old, is single and supports his parents. He has been running a retail shop for the last seven years. 

Lemashon knew about KADET through other clients registered in his area. This will be his second loan with KADET. He intends to spend it by buying more stock, such as sugar, tea leaves, flour, soft drinks, etc. for his shop.

Lemashon plans to reinvest the anticipated profits generated from this loan back into the  business. He dreams of becoming a wholesaler in the future. Lemashon can do more if provided with resources.

loans.use: to buy more stock for the shop

loans.name: Kiwambi Cha Motomoto Liyombo Group

texts.en:
Pauline is a 32-year-old married woman with four children, three of whom are attending primary school. She has been engaged in crop cultivation, especially maize, beans, and coffee, for over twelve years. She is experiencing low income due to lack of fertilizers and crop diseases for her growing crops.

Pauline is requesting funds to pay for fertilizers, insecticides, and productive maize seeds. 

She is working hard to expand her scale of production so that in five years she may be able to have enough food, to buy clothes, to fix her house, and cover medical expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, and productive maize seeds.

loans.name: Khom

texts.en:
Khom, 50, is married and resides with his wife and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. He carries sugar and fish to sell around his village. His wife is a rice vendor at the market. His daughter is a garment worker and his son works in a company.

Khom is asking for a loan of US $800 to purchase a new motorbike to carry sugar and fish to sell. In the future, he would like to expand his business and build a fence around his house.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike to carry sugar and fish to sell

loans.name: Oinepu

texts.en:
Oinepu, 32 years old, is married and is the father of one child. He has been farming for the last seven years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for mixed farming.

Oinepu learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his second loan, which he is planning to use to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies in preparation for the next planting season. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and educate his children.

Oinepu's hope is to buy and build rental premises. He is an energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: To buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a 33-year-old married woman with five children, all in school. She has operated a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan for one year. Grace is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase rice and beans for resale.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard, aged 27, is married and supports three people in his family.  He has been running a retail shop for the last seven years, earning a good income which is able to sustain his family.

Richard knew about KADET through other clients registered in his area. This will be his first loan with KADET, which he plans to use to buy more stock, such as maize and wheat flour, sugar, detergents, etc. for his shop.

Richard plans to reinvest the anticipated profits generated from this loan into the business. He dreams of becoming a wholesaler in the future. Richard can do more if provided with resources.

loans.use: To buy more stock for his shop

loans.name: Felixia

texts.en:
Felixia is a 48-year-old married woman from the town of Cortes, Bohol. She has an 11-year-old child. 

Felixia has been in the food sales business for 3 years, selling rice cakes and other local delicacies. She earns about 4,000 PHP per month from her business. Felixia plans to use this loan to purchase ingredients such as flour, sugar and cheese. She hopes for her business to grow and to be able to sustain her child's education.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as flour, sugar and cheese

loans.name: Umar

texts.ru: Умар честный и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он занимается скотоводством и начал эту работу 15 лет назад. В начале ему было трудно, его семья поддерживала его и сейчас он успешен в своем деле. Кроме этого он работает в дехканском хозяйстве своего  района. Умар хочет развивать  скотоводство и стать самым успешным в своей деятельностью. Умар просит вас о помощи на расширение его бизнеса и покупки скота. Он надеется, что вы станете причиной его успеха и поможете ему. Спасибо вам большое!
texts.en: Umar is an honest and focused person. He is married and is raising four children. He has been in the cattle-raising business for fifteen years. At the beginning, this was difficult for him, as his family was supporting him. Now he has a successful business. In addition, he works at his district’s dekhan farm. Umar wants to develop his cattle-raising and become the most successful in the business. Umar is asking for your help to expand his business and buy cattle. He hopes that your help will become the reason for his success. Thank you very much!

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Savon

texts.en: Savon, 36, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a garment worker. Her husband is a water vendor. One of her children is employed as a garment worker. Savon requests a loan of 500 USD to purchase house-building materials to build a new house. In the future, she would like to purchase more carts for her husband to carry water to sell and one more pumping machine. She also hopes to support her children in continuing their studies.

loans.use: to purchase house-building materials to build a new house

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is 33 years old, married and a father to two children. He has been a mixed farmer for the last 10 years.

He was introduced to KADET by a registered client in his abode. This is his second loan which he has planned to use to purchase farm inputs, i.e., fertilizers, seeds and chemicals and also buy animals for fattening. He intends to use the return from the loan to plough back into farming and part to repay the loan.

His dreams are to become a famous farmer in the area and to educate his kids to a higher level of education. He an industrious man who struggles to achieve if funded.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, seeds and chemicals and also buy animals for fattening.

loans.name: Nou

texts.en:
Mrs. Nou is now 69 years old, a widow who has been residing in Baray district. Presently, she lives with two children. Both of them are working to contribute to sustaining the family. At home, Mrs. Nou just takes some time to sell snacks, sweet things and biscuits to small children in the village. However, the main activity of her business is cultivating rice and other crops according to the season and the market demand.

With the loan of KHR 1,000,000, she will buy crop seeds and fertilizers to put on her farmland. In the future, she hopes that she will be able to expand her farmland and improve her farming business.

loans.use: to buy crop seeds and fertilizers to put on her farmland.

loans.name: Kevin

texts.en:
Kevin, aged 29 years, is married and supports three people in his family. He has been in farming for the past five years with good returns and profits. 

He heard about KADET through other clients registered in his area of dwelling. This will be his first loan with KADET and he intends to spend it to prepare the land for farming and purchase maize seeds.

His anticipation from the profit generated is to plough back into the farm and he dreams of becoming a famous farmer. He can do more if provided with resources.

loans.use: to prepare the land for farming and purchase maize seeds.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is married and has three children ranging from eleven to eighteen years of age. She describes herself as a God-fearing person and an optimistic woman. She has been selling handbags in a good and busy market for six years. Her business challenge is inadequate funds for adding to her stock of bags. She will use the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more handbags. In the future, Mary hopes to venture into a new business of providing transportation services using a bus.

loans.use: To buy more handbags.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is 33 years old, married and a father of three children who are all schooling. He is a farmer and this has been his work for the last fifteen years.

He learned about KADET through a registered client in his area of residence. This will be his first loan which he is planning to spend to purchase agricultural inputs, i.e., maize seeds, fertilizers and also hire manpower to aid in the farm. He hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand his farming activity from small-scale to commercial farming.

His dream is do large-scale farming and attain financial independence. He is a hard-working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs, i.e., maize seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ntalama

texts.en:
Ntalama is 28 years old and single. He has been farming maize for the past eight years. 

Ntalama knew about KADET through other registered clients. He has been a good client and is currently applying for his third loan, which he plans to use to prepare his land for farming and to buy farm supplies i.e. maize seeds and fertilizers.

Ntalama hopes to make a profit and use it to invest in another business. He is an assiduous man who can do more if funded.

loans.use: to prepare the land for farming and to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en: Jenifer, 25 years old, is single and has one child, who is in school. She has operated a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan, for six years. Jenifer is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and cassava flour. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beans and cassava flour

loans.name: Sinan

texts.en:
Sinan, 33, is married and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a garment worker. Her husband is a carpenter. Sinan is requesting a loan of US $500 to purchase a motorbike to commute to work. In the future, she would like to purchase rice to store in a warehouse in order to resell it when the price is higher. She would also like to build a fence around the house.

Sinan is not in the picture; the man in the picture is her husband.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorbike to commute to work

loans.name: Kanyinke

texts.en:
Kanyinke, 31 years old, is married and is the father of one child.  He has been farming for the last seven years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for mixed farming.

Kanyinke learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his second loan, which he plans to use to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and educate his children.

Kanyinke's dream is to buy and build rental premises in the future, thus creating financial independence. He is an energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to buy wheat seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase her stock.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael, aged 33 years, is married and supports seven people in his family. He has been in farming for the past four years and getting good returns from the harvests.
 
He learned about KADET through other clients registered in his area of dwelling. This will be his first loan with KADET and he intends to spend the loan amount on preparing the land for farming and purchasing maize seeds.

His anticipation from the profits generated is to plough them back into the farm and he dreams of becoming a well-known and great farmer. He can do more if provided with resources.

loans.use: to prepare the land for farming and purchase maize seeds.

loans.name: Nadutari

texts.en:
Nadutari is a very hard-working woman who has been a mixed farmer for the past three years. She rears animals, sells milk, and also does crop farming. She is 37 years old, married, and a mother to three children.

She is applying for her second loan. She plans to use part of the loan amount to buy farm inputs like fertilizers and wheat seeds and part to prepare the land. She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children's school fees. 

In future she hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, wheat seeds and pay for land preparation.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 27 years old, a single woman with three children. All of them are in school. She has had a business selling bread in Yambio, South Sudan for three years.

Lucia is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase bread. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase bread for sale.

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a very hard working woman who has been practicing mixed farming for over five years. She also has a hotel, which she manages as a secondary business. She is 29 years old and married. She and her husband have two children. 

She is applying for her second loan. She plans to use part of the loan to buy farm inputs like maize seeds and fertilizers and the other part to purchase more food stuffs for her hotel business. She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children’s school fees. 

She hopes to develop her business and be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like maize seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: St Eva United Group

texts.en: Ketty is a forty-year-old, hard-working lady with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her personal goals are to educate her children, build a permanent home, and buy a car. She has been trading in fish for four years. She started with 10,000 UGX in capital and now has over 2 million UGX. The major challenges are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock. However, she has a goal of buying land to grow crops so as to diversify her income sources. The purpose of the loan is to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay schoool fees for her children

loans.name: Hok

texts.en:
Mrs. Hok is a resident of the Baray district. She earns a living by cultivating rice crops, as well as raising piglets in a wooden piggery in her backyard. She has a common law relationship with her husband and is blessed with two single children, one of whom is a student. Through her pig fattening business, Mrs. Hok is able to earn an average of $2.00 per day to support her family. She also depends on income from her husband who transports and sells firewood from place to place. 

In order to increase rice production, Mrs. Hok wants to expand her farmland. However, her capital is insufficient. Thus, she is now requesting funds from HKL and Kiva to purchase two plots of farmland. Her goal is to improve her farming business and make a comfortable living for her children.

loans.use: to purchase two plots of farmland

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en:
Johnson is 34 years old and married with two children. He has been a farmer for the last six years.

He learned about KADET from other registered KADET groups. This will be his first loan, which he is planning to spend on preparing land for maize and wheat planting. These two crops have been doing well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to improve living standards for his family, save for the education of his children, and expand his business.

His dream is to prosper in the business of farming tomatoes, which he plans to plant next season in addition to the maize and wheat. He is a hard-working man who is determined to achieve the goals he has set.

loans.use: to prepare land for maize and wheat planting

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a 27-year-old, married woman. She has two children, both of whom are in school. For one year, she has operated a business selling food in a stall in Yambio, South Sudan.

Lucia is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase onions and cooking oil. She will use the extra income from this loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase onions and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Jumaboi

texts.ru: Джумабой женат и имеет четверых детей. Он более 15 лет является бригадиром в колхозе. Имеет 3,8 гектар арендованной земли, на который выращивает  кукурузу, пшеницу, помидоры и другие сельхозпродукции. Кроме этого он перерабатывает абрикосы, а также дома занимается разведением и откормом скота. В бизнесе помогают его семья, и они вместе дружно работают. Джумабой хочет приобрести минеральные удобрения для обработки земли, с этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за поддержку.
texts.en: Jumaboi is married and has four children.  He has been a foreman at a collective farm for over 15 years.  He leases 3.8 hectares of land, where he grows corn, wheat, tomatoes and other agricultural crops.  Besides this, he also processes apricots, and is involved in breeding and fattening up livestock at home.  His family helps him with the business, and they work well together.  Jumaboi wants to purchase mineral fertilizers for treating the land, and is requesting a loan in the sum of 5000 Somoni for this purpose.  He hopes to receive your help and thanks you in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 31-years old and married with two children. He does mixed farming i.e. rearing sheep, goats and also practices wheat farming which he has been doing for the past seven years.

He learned about KADET through a KADET staff. He paid his previous loan successfully and he has applied for the second loan which he plans to spend part in farming and the remainder to purchase more animals.

He hopes to make profits and use it to educate his children. He dreams of expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase more animals and to spend part on his farming

loans.name: Joy

texts.en: Joy is single and has no children yet. She describes herself as an outgoing and smart woman. She has run a beauty salon for the last two years and has two employees. Her business is located in an ideal place with potential for customers. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy beauty products and equipment. In the future Joy hopes to run a bigger parlor where she will be offering various services.

loans.use: To buy beauty products and equipment.

loans.name: Kipaloi

texts.en:
Kipaloi is 46 years old and married with four children. He has been a mixed farmer for the last 15 years.

He was introduced to KADET by another registered client in his abode. This is his third loan and he is planning to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers, seeds, and chemicals and also to buy animals for fattening. He intends to use the returns from the loan to plow back into farming and also to repay the loan.

His dreams are to become a famous farmer in the area and to educate his kids to a higher level of education. He is an industrious man who struggles to achieve.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers, seeds, and chemicals

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is 30 years old with four children.  Three of them are in school. She has a business which sells beer and breads in South Sudan for two year.
Juliana is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase more beer and breads. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beer and breads for sale.

loans.name: Koines

texts.en:
Koines has been practicing farming for the last five years. He is 29 years old, married and supports three people in his family.

He has been a good client who was introduced to KADET by a KADET staff. He has applied for his third loan which he plans to use to buy maize seeds and fertilizers, as well as hire temporary field workers to assist him in planting. 

In the future, he hopes to see his children prosper.

loans.use: to buy maize seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Pha

texts.en: Pha, 55, is married, resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a housewife. Her husband, Chamreoun, is a motor taxi driver. Two of her children are motor taxi driver as well. Pha is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to buy house-building material to build a small house for her children. In the future, she would like to run a motorbike shop for her child and build concrete house for herself.

loans.use: to purchase house-building material to build a small house

loans.name: Nora

texts.en: Nora is 28 year old a married woman with two children, both of whom are in school. She has a pub in Yambio South Sudan for the past three years.  Nora is requesting this loan through BRAC south Sudan to purchase beer and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beer and beans for sale

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en: Gerald thirty five years old,is married and has two children at age of four and seven years. He describes himself as a persistent and principled man. He has been selling spare parts and ink for the last twelve years in a busy street. He has two employees. His worry is the inflation which has led to low purchasing power from the customers. He will use the loan KES 50,000 to buy more spare parts. In the future, Gerald looks forward to running a big warehouse stocked with vehicle spare parts.

loans.use: To buy more spare parts.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis has been a farmer for three years. He is 34 years old, married, and has one kid.

He learned about KADET from marketing done by the KADET staff in his area. He has been a good client who repaid his previous loans well. This is his third loan which he plans to use to purchase farm supplies such as maize seeds and fertilizer and to hire casual workers to work on the farm. He intends to use the returns from the loan to reinvest in farming and buy a bigger farm.

His dreams are to be the best and most well-known farmer in the area. He is an industrious man who can do well if funded.

loans.use: To purchase farm supplies such as maize seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Parmuat

texts.en:
Parmuat is 43 years old and married with six children. He has been a mixed farmer for the last 16 years.

He was introduced to KADET by a registered client in his abode. This is his second loan and he is planning to use it to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers, seeds, and chemicals and also to buy cows and goats for fattening. He intends to use the returns from the loan to plow back into farming and also to repay the loan.

His dream is to become a famous farmer in the area and to help his kids to get a higher level of education. He is a hard-working man who struggles to achieve.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers, seeds, and chemicals

loans.name: Abduchamol

texts.ru: Абдучамол прекрасный семьянин. Женат, отец четверых детей. Жена домохозяйка. Содержать большую семью очень трудно и требует больших усилий. Кроме членов своей семьи он еще имеет на иждивении родителей. Для содержания семьи он занимается более пяти лет откормом и выращиванием скота. В бизнесе ему помогает жена. Кроме этого бизнеса он еще занимается предоставлением услуг такси. Он хотел бы расширить свой бизнес но для этого нужны материальные средства. Он хотел бы получить займ для расширения бизнеса- закупа скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие. Он заранее благодарен вам. Спасибо!
texts.en: Abduchamol is a beautiful family man.  He is married and is a father of four children.  His wife is a homemaker.  It is very difficult to support a large family and requires a lot of effort.  Besides his family members, Abduchamol also supports his parents.  He has been involved in fattening up and raising livestock for over five years in order to support his family.  His wife helps him with this business.  Besides this business, Abduchamol is also involved in providing a taxi service.  He wants to expand his business, but needs financial sources for this.  Abduchamol wants to obtain a loan to purchase livestock and expand his business.  He relies on your help and mercy.  He is grateful to you in advance.  Thank you!

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Loice

texts.en: Loice is a 25-year-old married woman with three children -- two of them are in school. She has a six-year business of selling clothes in Yambio, South Sudan. Loice is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase clothes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for sale.

loans.name: Kong

texts.en: Mrs. Kong is a 39-year-old mother of 3 single children. Mrs. Kong and her husband are in same business, cultivating rice crops year-round for their livelihoods. As shown in the photo, living in a longstanding thatched house causes the whole family experience many difficulties. Mrs. Kong has saved some money to purchase a finished house but until now her capital has not been enough to buy one. By chance, a nearby villager would like to sell his land and house because he will move away. Therefore, Mrs. Kong is applying for a loan from Kiva to supplement her capital to buy the house. She hopes all lenders will not reject her loan and kindly help her family.

loans.use: to buy a house.

loans.name: Nkorias

texts.en:
Nkorias is 43 years old, married together with his wife they have four children. He is a wheat and maize farmer who has been farming for the last fifteen years.

He has applied for his third loan with KADET LTD to purchase farm supplies such as seeds and fertilizer, and to buy more animals such as goats and sheep. He hopes to make a profit and to use it to educate his children and expand his farm.

In the future he hopes to open up another business. He is a persevering man who can do more if funded.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies such as seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a very hard-working woman who practices mixed farming and runs a grocery stall as a secondary business. She has been in this business for over five years and earns a monthly profit of 5,000 KES. She is 32 years old, married to a farmer, and has two children. 

She is applying for her first loan which she plans to use partly to buy farm supplies like maize seeds and fertilizers and partly in her grocery business. She intends to use the additional income from the proceeds of this loan to buy cattle for fattening and to pay her children's school fees. 

She hopes to develop her business and to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies like maize seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Kezia

texts.en:
Kezia is 40-year-old married woman with five children, all of whom are in school. She has had a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan for five years.

Kezia is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees for her children

loans.use: to purchase beans and onions for resale.

loans.name: Gani

texts.ru: Гани  трудолюбивый, добросовестный человек. Он прекрасный семьянин отец одного сына. Его жена занимается пошивом национальных одеял. Они вместе трудятся на благосостояние семьи. Он сам занимается выращиванием и откормом скота. Начинал он с откорма одного теленка и постоянно расширил свой бизнес. Его труды приносят свои плоды. На сегодняшний день он имеет два голов крупного рогатого скота и 6 голов мелко рогатого скота. Он хочет получить займ для улучшения своих жилищных условий- ремонта дома. Ему надо завершить штукатурку, покрыть пол и потолки дома. Он надеется, что его поддержат в улучшении жилищных условий и предоставят запрашиваемый займ, он хочет получить займ  в размере 5000 сомони и завершить свои работы. Он уверен в вашей поддержке и благодарен вам. Спасибо большое!
texts.en:
Gani is a hardworking, honest man. He is a wonderful family man and father of one son. His wife works with sewing national blankets. They are working together on the welfare of their family. He works with breeding and fattening up cattle. He started with fattening up a calf and constantly grew his business. His labors are bearing fruit. Today he owns two head of cattle and six head of small cattle. 

Gani wants to get a loan to improve his living conditions - to repair his house. He needs to finish the plaster and cover the floor and ceiling of the house. He hopes that he will be supported in the improvement of his living conditions and that the requested loan will be granted, he wants to get a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni and complete his work. He is confident in your support and is grateful to you. Thank you very much!

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Myriam

texts.es:
La Sra. Myriam tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, el cual es la razón de ser de Myrian. Ella se dedica al comercio, tiene una despensa en su casa, y además de eso hace sandwish para la venta en un colegio aledaño del barrio.
El negocio lo tiene montado ya hace 10 años, cuenta que le va muy bien ya que viven en una zona muy poblada, ella sola administra su despensa y gracias a su esfuerzo ha podido salir adelante.
Agradece a la fundacion ya que mediante los créditos otorgados su micro empresa fue creciendo, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lácteos, panificados y demás para la despensa, ya que se acerca los días festivos que es cuando hay más venta hay y para lo cual necesita surtirlo bien.
Myriam desea que su hijo se vaya formando como persona y dedicarse al estudio, por lo cual se esmera cada día para que a él no le falte nada.
texts.en:
Señora Myriam is 39 years old, a single mother, and has a son, who she lives for.  She works in sales and has a tiny shop in her house.  She also makes sandwhiches to sell at a local school in her neighborhood.  She has had her business for over 10 years, which has been going very well since she lives in a very populated area.  She works solely in the management of her shop and has been able to move forward thanks to all of her efforts.  

She is deeply appreciative of the foundation because her micro-business has grown because of their credits.  She is applying for a loan so that she may purchase grocery items, drinks, dairy products, baked goods, and other products for her shop since the holidays are approaching, which is when she needs to have the best inventory because of increase in sales.  

Myriam hopes that her son keeps studying and as such works hard every day to ensure that he never lacks anything.

loans.use: purchase groceries, drinks, dairy products, baked goods, and other food items.

loans.name: Elda

texts.en:
Elda is a 35-year-old married woman with six children, all of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Yambio, South Sudan for five years.

Elda is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Memory

texts.en:
Memory is a middle-aged woman who lives in the small town of Shurugwi near Gweru city. She has borrowed once before from Kiva. With the previous loan she purchased groceries, which include sugar, beans, salt, bread, and flour, for her shop. 

Memory has requested a loan of $1,200. With this loan she will be able to stock up and increase sales volume and also increase her profits. With the income generated, the family’s standard of living will also be improved, as she is now able to buy better food for a balanced diet. She also will have more income to spend at home. 

She hopes to open her own retail supermarket in the future and expand to other parts of the country.

loans.use: to buy groceries for the shop such as sugar, beans, salt, bread, and flour.

loans.name: Adkham

texts.ru: Адхам умный и  добросовестный человек. ОН заботливый семьянин. Он фермер и имеет небольшой участок земли. В этот участок он вложил все свои силы, там выращивает сельскохозяйственные- культуры более 5 лет. В основном он выращивает пшеницу и лук. Кроме этого он занимается скотоводством, от которого получает небольшой доход. В его деле  помогает жена, которая старается всегда и во всем поддержать мужа. Адхам хотел бы получить займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки селитры и семян для посева репчатого лука. Он и его жена надеется на вашу поддержку, и они очень ждут вашей помощи.
texts.en:
Adkham is an intelligent and conscientious man. He cares about his family. He is a farmer and has a small plot of land, where he has been growing agricultural plants for over 5 years. He grows mainly wheat and onions. He is also engaged in cattle breeding, which brings him a small income. His wife helps him and gives her support in his business. 

Adham would like to receive a loan of 4000 Somoni to purchase nitrate fertilizer and onion seeds for planting. He and his wife are looking forward to your help and support. Support and assistance to people is a very noble deed, and we are confident in your support. Thank you very much!

loans.use: to purchase nitrate fertilizer and onion seeds for planting

loans.name: Raza

texts.en:
Raza is a 20-year-old single woman with no children. She has had a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan for two years.

Raza is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans, rice, and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans, and rice for resale.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 63 years old, married, and has six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Nenita runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her store.

She has been in this business for twenty-two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, milk, canned goods, noodles, spices, etc.
 
In the future, Nenita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is 30 years old and married with 3 children.

Belen works hard to provide for her family. She runs a firewood retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of firewood to sell.

Belen has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the firewood retail business for 5 years and also earns an income from a sari-sari store and fish vending.

Belen aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of firewood to sell

loans.name: Benjin

texts.en:
Benjin is 28 years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Benjin is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Benjin has been raising pigs for 9 years and also earns additional income from banana retail.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
As a married parent of 7 children, Lea works hard to support her family.

She has a banana business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening and sari sari store. Lea is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of banana for her business.

Lea has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her 3 children to college.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of banana to sell

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 48 years old, married and has 2 children. 

Marissa is in the agricultural business buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Marissa requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

Marissa has been buying and selling livestock for 3 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marissa would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional livestock to sell

loans.name: Miralona

texts.en:
Miralona is 38 years old and married with 4 children.

Miralona works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

Miralona has borrowed and paid back 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 4 years and also earns an income from a meat shop and hog raising.

Miralona aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell in her sari-sari store

loans.name: Abdugani

texts.ru: Абдугани примерный семьянин. У него трое детей. Жена работает в колхозе. Он занимается откормом крупного рогатого скота. В свободное от работы время жена тоже помогает мужу. Более 15 лет он занимается этим бизнесом и имеет богатый опыт. Он хочет увеличить поголовье  скота и таким образом хочет получить хорошую прибыль. Для этих целей ему надо получить займ и продвинуть свое дело намного вперед. Он надеется получить займ и заранее благодарен вам за вашу доброту и помощь. Спасибо вам за ваше доброе сердце.
texts.en: Abdugani is an exemplary family man. He has three children, and his wife works on the farm. He works fattening cattle.  His wife helps him in her free time. He has been in business for more than fifteen years and has extensive experience. He wants to increase his livestock and earn a decent profit. To do this, he needs to get a loan and expand his business.  He hopes to get a loan and thanks you in advance for your kindness and help. Thank you for your kind heart.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Imomkul

texts.ru: Имомкул примерный отец и на воспитании имеет троих сыновей и одну дочь. Его жена домохозяйка, а он сам занимается бизнесом, чтобы обеспечить свою семью. Более 21 года Имомкул занимается выращиваем лука, пшеницы и риса. Отходы от сельхозкультур идут на откорм скота, Ведь кроме этого он занимается скотоводством. В бизнесе помогают ему его сыновья. Имомкул запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян лука. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Imomkul is an exemplary father and is bringing up three sons and one daughter. His wife is a housewife, and he is engaged in business by himself to provide for his family. Imomkul has been engaged in growing onions, wheat and rice for more than 21 years. Wastes from the crops go to feed the livestock as he is also engaged in raising animals. His sons help him in his business. Imomkul is requesting a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and seed onions. He looks forward to your help and thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and seed onions

loans.name: Grace Wairimu

texts.en: Grace, 39 years old, is a married woman. She has 2 children, a son and a daughter, at 6 and 23 years. She describes herself as a determined, honest and open-minded woman. She operates a grocery store where she sells potatoes. She has been involved in this business for 17 years. Her primary customers are frequent and new. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the loan to add to her stock of potatoes. Her business goal is to be supplying potatoes within 5 years to retailers.

loans.use: To buy more potatoes.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es:
Ignacio tiene 39 años de edad, es soltero sin hijos, vive en su casa propia en la ciudad de Carapeguá.  Comenta que se dedica al lavado de vehículos en general, como ser de motos, autos, camionetas, etc. Se dedica a esto hace más de 3 años, y cuenta con un buen promedio de clientes ya que el trabajo que realiza es bueno.
El es uno de los mejores de la ciudad, lo demuestra en la calidad del lavado que realiza en cada vehículo que va a su lavadero, además la cordialidad que demuestra al cliente es muy bien ponderado por todos. El comenta que quiere seguir creciendo, por loo que solicita la ayuda de la fundacion.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de una aspiradora ya que cuenta con una sola y la gran cantidad de clientes que tiene que atender todos los días le obliga a adquirirla
texts.en:
Ignacio is thirty-nine-years-old, single, and doesn't have any children.  He lives in his own house in the city of Carapeguá.  He says he makes his living washing vehicles, including motorcycles, cars, vans, etc.  He's been doing this for more than three years and has quite a few customers because he does good work.  

Ignacio is one of the best in the city, as evidenced by the quality job he does on every vehicle that comes to his car wash, and the courtesy he affords his customers is highly praised by all.  He says he is seeking help from Fundación Paraguaya because he wants to keep growing.   He's requesting a loan to buy a vacuum cleaner because he has only one and he needs another to serve the large number of customers he has every day.

loans.use: to buy a vacuum cleaner to use in his carwash.

loans.name: Gulshod

texts.ru: Гульшод замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Она является преподавателем в местной школе. Её зарплата не хватает на содержание семьи и поэтому она начала заниматься дополнительно агробизнесом. Этот бизнес является скотоводством и выращивание сельхозкультур. Более 20 лет она в этом бизнесе и она имеет хороший опыт. Гульшод хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и хочет сделать штукатурку и покрыть пол и потолки. С этой целью он просит вас о помощи. Спасибо вам большое!
texts.en: Gulshod is married and is a loving mother of four children.  She is a teacher at a local school.  Her salary is, however, not enough to support her family, and this is why she also got involved in an agricultural business.  This business is animal husbandry and growing agricultural crops.  Gulshod has been in this business for over 20 years and has a good experience in it.  Gulshod wants to improve her living conditions and wants to make plaster and cover floors and ceilings.  She is asking you for help for this purpose.  Thank you very much!

loans.use: to improve her living conditions

loans.name: Getrude

texts.en: Getrude is a 31 year old married woman. She has 2 children with ages ranging from 3 years to 10 years. She describes herself to be caring. She operates a retail store where she sells charcoal. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located at a viable place. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more bags of charcoal. Her business goal is to run three other similar retail stores within 5 years.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Gulzat

texts.ru:
Гульзат 44 года, разведена и имеет 5 детей.  Гульзат работает в территориальной больнице фельдшером – лаборантом. К сожалению, заработной платы Гульзат не хватает для покрытия всех расходов ее семьи, поэтому в 2009 году, она решила начать свой бизнес в разведении скота. Использовав свой стартовый капитал в сумме всего лишь 4,000 сом (KGS), Гульзат смогла развить свое хозяйство в численностью в одну корову, пять баранов и одного бычка. 
Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульзат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного скота. Доходы Гульзат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, а в будущем – сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Gulzat is 44 years old, divorced and has five children. Gulzat works as territory hospital laboratory nurse. Unfortunately, Gulzat's wages are not enough to cover all of her family, so in 2009 she decided to start a business in the breeding of lovestock. Using startup capital amounting to only 4,000 Som (KGS), Gulzat was able to develop her household in the number of one cow, five sheep and one calf. 

For the further development of her business, Gulzat contacted Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 80,000 Som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. Gulzat plans to invest her revenues to further increase the number of livestock and, in the future, to make home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr:
Mme Sokhna est une jeune dame de 33 ans mariée, qui fait du commerce depuis six ans déjà.
Avec le crédit, elle veut acheter  les ingrédients  qui vont dans la préparation des succulents mets qu’elle prépare : de l’oignon, de la viande, de la pomme de terre, du poivre, des pates…
Avec  les bénéfices de son commerce, elle augmente son fond de roulement.
texts.en: Sokhna is a young 33-year-old woman who is married and has been working in her business for six years.  With her loan, she would like to buy some ingredients (such as onions, meat, potatoes, pepper and pasta) to prepare the delicious dishes that she serves. With the profits from her business, she will increase her working capital.

loans.use: To buy some ingredients to prepare dishes that she will sell.

loans.name: Hamad

texts.en: Hamad who is 39 years old, is a father of four sons and one daughter. He is a worker with a decent salary. Hamad wants to complete finishing his house such as: installing tiles, installing windows and doors, painting etc. so he can live in healthy and comfortable house conditions. Hamad hasn't enough money to pay, so he needs to take a loan from FATEN to pay. When Hamad gets the loan, he will be able to pay for all the expenses needed to finish his house. Taking this loan will enable Hamad to live with his family in better living conditions. Hamad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To pay for finishing the house

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар замужем имеет двоих взрослых детей. Более 22 года она занимается купле- продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она встает рано утро, чтобы ухаживать и откармливать скот. Она любит свое дело и с удовольствием занимается этим. Дилбар хотела бы получить займ для расширения своего бизнеса на приобретение мелкого и крупного рогатого скота. Она надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарна вам за вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Dilbar is married and has two adult children.  She has been involved in buying and selling cattle and small livestock for over 22 years.  She is a very hardworking woman.  She gets up early in the mornings in order to take care of and feed livestock.  Dilbar loves her business and runs it with pleasure.  She wants to obtain a loan to expand her business by purchasing small livestock and cattle.  Dilbar relies on your help and thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Siama

texts.en:
Siama is a 35 year old married woman with three children, all of them in school. She has had a business of selling food items in Yambio, South Sudan for eleven months.
Siama is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar, bananas and pineapple. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, bananas and pineapple for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more chicks and more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is a 28 years old business woman, who lives in Juba.  She is a single mother and has three children between the ages of 11 and 4.  All of them go to school. 

Harriet runs a salon business, and she has been in the business for two years.  She has two employees.  Harriet heard about Finance Sudan through their fellow clients and the outreach and promotion done by the loans officers.  She is taking a loan of 2000 to purchase more weaves, plastic chairs for the customers, and other related items.  In addition to this business; harriet has no other source of income. 

In five years time, harriet would like to hope for increments in the size of her business, in order to have a better house.

Because she is a single mother, her major challenges include home expenses and school fees.

Harriet says that she is happy with Finance Sudan for their service.

loans.use: to purchase more weaves, plastic chairs for the customers, and other related items.

loans.name: Marifat

texts.ru: Марифат женщина 51 года, замужем имеет двоих детей. Одна дочь и старший сын, который на заработках в России. Муж не работает, т.к инвалид второй группы, занимается домашними мужскими делами. Сын присылая деньги помогает жить родителям. Сама Марифат сидит на рынке и продаёт нижнее женское бельё и колготки.Она хочет на полученный кредит закупить партию зимних колгот и бриджей, которые пользуются большим спросом у населения на рынке. Она за четырёхлетний период кредитования ни разу не нарушала условия организации и кредит использует целенаправлено.
texts.en: Marifat is 51 year-old woman, married and has two children.  She has one daughter and an older son, who is now in Russia for work.  Her husband does not work because he is a disabled person of a second group, and takes care of men's home work.  Their son helps the parents by sending money home.  Marifat works at a market and sells women's undergarments and stockings.  She wants to use this loan to purchase an inventory of winter stockings and breeches, which are in high demand among the residents at the market.  Over her four years of obtaining financing, Marifat has not once violated the terms of the organization and has used her loans purposefully.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of winter clothing

loans.name: Naimchon

texts.ru: Наимчон парень 27 лет, пока не женат, единственный сын в семье. Он проживает вместе с родителями. Работает в городской сауне, его дохода хватает на жизнь, но на крупные семейные расходы не может накопить. Поэтому он решил получить кредит на ремонт дома, у него протекает крыша, и он хочет обновить шифер крыши. Он на снимке в день выдачи, рад получению запрашиваемой суммы.
texts.en: Naimchon is a 27 year-old young man, not yet married and is the only son in his family.  He lives with his parents.  Naimchon works at the city sauna and has enough income for living, but is unable to save for big family expenses.  This is why he decided to obtain a loan to repair his house that has a leaking roof.  Naimchon wants to replace the roof slate.  The photograph shows him on the disbursement day, happy to obtain the requested sum.

loans.use: For roof repairs at home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy millet and groundnuts.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 36 year old married woman with two children.  Both of them are in school.  She has had a business of selling food in Yambio South Sudan for the past two years.
Margret is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice.  She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase rice and beans for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more food items like cassava flour, Irish onions, and many others items.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
La formación del presente comité se inicio la Sra. Máxima, quien organizó y comento a sus amigas y vecinas del barrio acerca del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación, con lo cual quedaron encantadas, de allí surge el grupo llamado "San  Cayetano “, el que se encuentra actualmente en el 1° ciclo con 13 integrantes, es un grupo de señoras muy responsables y trabajadoras, ellas se dedican diversas actividades, pero también hacen actividades en forma grupal para seguir sobresaliendo.
La señora Máxima nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de Chipa (es un alimento tradicional de Paraguay), en lo cual le va muy bien, pues siempre tiene buena venta, ya sea que haga frió o calor. Ella comenta que desea poder crecer cada día más y por medio de su trabajo darle a su familia todo lo que ellos necesiten para una vida digna y decorosa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de chipas, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad de crecimiento que les da.
texts.en:
This group was formed by Sra. Maxima, who organized her friends and neighbors and told them about this program for entrepreneurial women, offered by Foundation Paraguaya [Kiva Field Partner]. The group of women were enchanted with the idea, and from there created the croup "San Cayetano," currently in its first loan cycle with 13 members. It is a group of very responsible and hard working women. They have diverse businesses, but also participate in group activities to continue forging ahead. 

Maxima tells us that she works selling "Chipas" (a traditional Paraguayan snack), which sell very well. She always has high sales, whether it's hot or cold out. She says that she wants to be able to grow her business each day and through her work be able to give her family everything that they need to have a dignified and decent life. 

She is requesting a loan to buy chipas, to increase supply and fill her customers' demand. She thanks the Foundation and Kiva for the growth opportunity that they provide.

loans.use: to buy cheese buns to sell.

loans.name: Modi

texts.en:
Modi is a 40 year old a married woman with no children.  She has a business of selling food in Yambio South Sudan for the past two years.
Modi is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice to sell.  She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Santina

texts.en: Santina is a 27-year-old married woman with four children, and all of them are in school.  She has had a business of selling charcoal in Yambio, South Sudan for one year.  Santina is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase additional charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a 30 year old business woman who lives in Juba. She is married and has 5 children between the ages of 14 and 2. Three of them go to school. 

Susan runs a tea business, and she has been in the business for 1 year. She has no employees. Susan heard about Finance Sudan through fellow clients and outreach and promotion done by the loans officers. She is taking a loan of 500 Sudanese Pounds to purchase more food items: sugar, tea leaves, new cups and many others. In additions to this business, Susan’s husband gives her little support in terms of cash.

In 5 years time, Susan hopes to change it into a hotel.

Her major challenges include, issues of school fees and home expenses. 

Susan says that she is happy for finance Sudan’s support, especially for women.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, tea leaves, new cups and many others.

loans.name: Purusila

texts.en:
Purusila is 30 years old, married, with four children. Three of them are in school. She has had a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan for two years.

Purusila is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en: Faith is 30 years old, single and has two children, ages two and four. She describes herself as an honest and God-fearing woman. She has been running a salon for the last four years. Her business is faced with the problem of low purchasing power, sometimes from the customers. She will use the loan of Kes50,000 to buy dryers and machines for reflexology. In the future, Faith wants to run a bigger salon.

loans.use: To buy dryers and machine for reflexology.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en: Norah is 30 years old, married, and has four children who are all in school. She has had a food stall business in Yambio, South Sudan for two years. Norah is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone is very pleased to present to you Joseph, a small scale entrepreneur who has come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of SLL 3,000,000.00 in order to invest in his business. 

Joseph sells spare-parts like tires, spanners, chains, belts, sockets, etc. He has been doing this business for six years now in the township of Magburaka, in Northern Sierra Leone. A husband and a father of five school going children, the forty-year-old was born in Mayagba village. He has requested this loan in order to buy a large quantity of spare parts to add to his shop.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of spare parts to add to his shop

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 27 years old, married, and has three children ranging in age from one to ten. She describes herself as a principled woman. She has sold cakes in a busy estate for the last two years. Her business faces the challenge of high prices of ingredients (like baking flour) for baking cakes. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy a motorbike which will help her deliver the cakes to her customers. In the future, Grace hopes to run a big bakery shop.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to deliver cakes.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 42-year-old married woman with five children who are all in school. She has had a business selling food stuff in Yambio, South Sudan for four years. 

Elizabeth is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice. she will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Daniel Duraman

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you Daniel, a small scale entrepreneur who has come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 3,000,000.00 Sierra Leonean Leones in order to invest in his business. 

Daniel owns a grocery store on the outskirt of Magburaka town. He sells drinks, bread, chewing gums, mints, biscuits, toothpastes, salts, batteries, etc. Daniel has been a businessman for many years now. 

Fifty-seven year old Daniel is married to a businesswoman and the couple have five children, one of whom is in college, and the rest are no longer attending school. Daniel was born in the village of Magburaka town. This is his second Kiva loan. With the help of his first Kiva loan, Daniel's business expanded from a hawker to a proud shop owner. He has requested this loan in order to even further expand his business by buying the above mentioned items in bulk to add to his shop.

loans.use: to buy drinks, bread, chewing gums, mints, biscuits, toothpastes, salts, batteries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay the expenses for finishing his house

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 38-year-old married woman with five children, all of them are in school. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Yambio, South Sudan for six months.

Mary is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a concrete house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Modi

texts.en: Modi is a 38-year-old married woman with four children, all of whom are in school. She has had a fish selling business in Yambio, South Sudan for two years. Modi is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a 20-year-old single woman with no children. She has a business selling fish in Yambio, South Sudan for one year.
Agnes is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Mujeres Emprendedoras” está conformado por 19 emprendedoras, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran preparación y venta de colaciones, venta de ropa nueva y accesorios, entre otros. Todas ellas pertenecientes a la ciudad de Concepción.
Verónica presidenta del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en tercer lugar, entre las tres que lo están, además usa anteojos y su cabello es ondulado. 
Se dedica a la producción de mermeladas caseras, de acuerdo a la fruta que esté de temporada. Además para la temporada de navidad agrega a su negocio la preparación de pan de pascua y galletas. Y durante la época de invierno prepara frutas en conserva. 
Comenta que éste oficio lo aprendió de manera autodidacta y lo realiza desde hace 10 años. 
Con el tiempo ha ido incrementando el número de clientes, ya que sus mismos clientes son quienes promocionan sus productos, por lo que ahora cuenta con clientela fija.
Sus insumos como los frascos de vidrio, los compra en la ciudad de Santiago y las frutas las encarga a la ciudad de Quillón. 
Con el crédito comprará ollas grandes, que le servirán para cocer la fruta y después prepararla como mermelada. Además de frutas de temporada.
Una de sus metas para su negocio, es participar de algún curso que otorgue la municipalidad para perfeccionarse en sus preparaciones. Otra de sus metas es tener un local en su misma casa, donde pueda ofrecer y vender sus productos.
Verónica vive junto a su marido y sus tres hijas de 25, 21 y 20 años de edad, quienes estudian carreras profesionales, situación que tiene muy contenta y orgullosa a Verónica.
La motivación de Verónica de continuar con el negocio, se debe a que ella disfruta mucho lo que realiza.
Además está muy contenta y agradecida de participar en Fondo esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio, por lo demás las capacitaciones han sido un gran aporte para su negocio, con los aprendizajes de contabilidad, ya que le ha permitido invertir y distribuir de mejor manera sus ingresos. 
Por otro lado el grupo del Banco comunal, del cual forma parte es muy unido, comprometido y solidario, por lo que Verónica se siente muy cómoda y contenta. 
Concepción, está asentada en la desembocadura del río Biobío, uno de los más grandes del país, al sur de Chile, en la región del Bíobío. Ha tenido una importante función en nuestra historia, siendo sede de importantes batallas y asentamiento relevante, especialmente durante la Guerra de Arauco, por estar en la frontera con territorio mapuche. Actualmente la ciudad posee un importante desarrollo económico y demográfico, llegando a ser considerada como uno de los núcleos urbanos, demográfico, administrativo, financiero y comercial más relevantes de Chile, después de Santiago y Valparaíso.
texts.en:
This community bank is called "Enterprising Women." It consists of 19 entrepreneurs, who work in different areas, among which are preparation and sale of sweets, and sales of new clothing and accessories. All the members live in the city of Concepción.

In the photo, Verónica, the president of the communal bank, is seated in the third spot; among the three seated women, she has glasses and her hair is wavy. She makes homemade jams, using whatever fruit is in season. In addition, for the Christmas season, she adds the preparation of fruitcake and cookies to her business. And during the winter season she prepares fruit preserves. She comments that she learned this business by teaching herself and she has been doing it for 10 years. With time, she has increased the number of customers. Since the same clients are the ones who promote her products, she now has a fixed customer base. She buys her supplies, such glass jars, in the city of Santiago, and she gets the fruits in the city of Quillón. With her loan she will buy big pots, in which she will cook the fruit and make it, for example, into marmalade, and in addition, she will buy seasonal fruit. One of her goals for her business is to participate in a course that the municipality offers to perfect her products. Another of her goals is to have a shop in her own house, where she can offer and sell her products. 

Verónica lives with her husband and their three daughters, ages 25, 21, and 20, who are studying for professional careers, a situation which makes Verónica very happy and proud. Verónica's motivation to continue with her business is due to the fact that she very much enjoys what she does. In addition, she is very happy and thankful to participate in Fondo Esperanza, since it has permitted her to invest in her business. Apart from this, the training sessions, with the training in accounting, have been a great contribution to her business, since it has permitted her to invest and distribute her income better.

From another perspective, the community bank, of which she is a part, is very united, committed, and supportive, so Veronica feels very comfortable and happy.

Concepción is located at the mouth of the Bíobío river, one of the largest rivers in the country, in the south of Chile in the Bíobío region. It has had an important role in our history, being the site of important battles and related agreements, especially during the war of Arauco, because it was on the frontier of the Mapuche territory. Now the city has experienced important economic and demographic development and has come to be considered one of the most relevant urban, demographic, administrative, financial and commercial centers of Chile, after Santiago and Valparaíso.

loans.use: to buy big pots for cooking fruit and preparing marmalade and to buy seasonal fruits.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 30 year old a married woman with three children.  Two of them are in school. She has a business of selling charcoal in Yambio South Sudan for one year.
Grace is requesting this loan through BRAC south Sudan to purchase charcoal.  She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Folbe

texts.en:
Folbe is 30 year old a married woman with four children.  Three of them are in school. She has a business selling beer in Yambio South Sudan for the past four years.
Folbe is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beer. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beer for sale.

loans.name: Adela Narcisa

texts.es:
Adela es una mujer responsable en su trabajo y no se rinde facilmente, tiene 45 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en Píllaro que está cerca de Ambato en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador.

Adela trabaja con su familia en la crianza de cerdos, compra crías de cerdos para engordarlos y después para sacar a la venta en las ferias. Es la segunda vez que trabaja con Fodemi, crédito que será invertido en la compra de crías de cerdo, ya que necesita aumentar el número de cerdos ya que por temporada navideña vende más y quiere aprovechar para poder obtener más ingresos y poder mantener a su familia.

Adela quiere seguir trabajando para poder aumentar el número de animales y así buscar buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Adela is a woman who is responsible in her work and doesn't give up easily. She is 45 years old, is married, and has 3 children. She lives with her family in Píllaro, which is close to Ambato in the Sierra Centro region of Ecuador.

Adela works with her family raising pigs. She buys baby pigs to fatten them and then takes them to the fairs to sell. This is the second time that she has worked with Fodemi. She will invest her loan in the purchase of baby pigs, since she needs to increase the number of pigs she has, since she sells more during the Christmas season, and she wants to take advantage of this to be able to obtain more income and be able to support her family.

Adela wants to continue working to be able to increase her number of animals and thus seek a good income.

loans.use: to invest in baby pigs to fatten and later sell at the fairs.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.en:
Bibiana is a 22-year-old business woman who lives in Juba. She is married and has 1 child who is 5 years old and goes to school. 

Bibiana runs a small hotel business, and she has been in business for 1 year. She has 2 employees. Bibiana heard about Finance Sudan through the fellow clients and outreach and promotion done by the loans officers. She is taking a loan of 500 to purchase more food items to be cooked. Other than this business, Bibiana has no other source of income. 

In 5 years time, Bibiana would like to hope for a good house.

Her major challenges include home expenses although her husband helps with support in the form of cash.

Bibiana says that she is happy for finance Sudan’s support.

loans.use: to purchase more food items to be cooked

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is 45 year old a married woman with five children, all of whom are in school.  She has a business of selling food at a stall in Yambio South Sudan for the past eight months.
Lina is requesting this loan through BRAC south Sudan to purchase sugar.  She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children

loans.use: to purchase sugar for sale.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: La señora Elvira  tiene una tienda de barrio, se dedica a esta actividad hace doce años, ella es viuda  por lo que percibe una renta de su esposo, ya no tiene a nadie bajo su responsabilidad ya que sus hijos todos son independientes, cuenta con domicilio propio en la  zona de Kami,  solicita el crédito para compra de productos necesarios para la venta en su tienda y así surtir su tienda, comprara productos como abarrotes, dulces, galletas y refrescos, pues quiere que su negocio crezca un poco mas para así poder heredarles una fuente de ingresos a sus hijos, la Sra. Elvira se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que la institución le brinda.
texts.en: Señora Elvira has a neighborhood store. She has been working in this business for twelve years. She is a widow, so she receives her husband's pension. She is not responsible for anyone else, since her children are independent. She has her own house in the Kami district. She is applying for the loan to buy basic products to sell in her store and thus to stock her store. She will buy products such as groceries, sweets, crackers, and soft drinks, since she wants her business to grow a bit more so that she can leave a source of income to her children. Sra. Elvira is happy and grateful for the opportunity that the institution offers her.

loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: La señora Matilde es licenciada en lingüística y trabaja en un colegio de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere  para el pago de trámites para la compra de un terreno para en el futuro poder construir su propia casa.  Matilde es casada y tiene dos hijos. Vive en una casa que pertenece a un familiar ubicada en la zona  de chasquipampa, de la Ciudad de La Paz. Matilde es cliente de Impro desde el año 2010, con un historial de dos créditos anteriores que fueron pagados sin problemas. Esta es la segunda vez que Matilde solicita que su solicitud sea canalizada a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Matilde has a degree in Linguistics and works at a school in the city of La Paz.  She needs the loan to pay transaction fees to buy a lot so that she can build her own house there in the future.  Matilde is married and has two children.  She lives in a house that belongs to a relative and that’s located in the city of La Paz’s Chasquipampa zone.  Matilde has been an Impro client since 2010 and has had two previous loans that were repaid problem-free.  This is the second time that Matilde has requested her loan be channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to pay transaction fees to purchase a lot.

loans.name: Aida María

texts.es:
Aida tiene 45 años, es una mujer de caracter fuerte y muy responsable, es casada y tiene un hijo de 15 años de edad, vive con su familia en Píllaro que se encuentra muy cerca de Ambato en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador.

Aida trabaja sola en la crianza de cerdos, es la tercera vez que solicita créditos a Fodemi, crédito que será utilizado en la ampliación de la infraestructura de las chancheras ya que quiere comprar más chanchos y actualmente los corrales son pequeños. Esta inversión le permitirá incrementar su negocio, ventas e ingresos económicos que ayudaran a mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.

El sueño que tiene es poder tener una distribuidora directa de chanchos.
texts.en:
Aida is 45 years old and  is a woman of strong character who is very responsible.  She is married with one son 15 years old and she lives with her family in Píllaro, which is very near Ambato in Sierra Centro, Ecuador.

Aida works alone raising pigs and this is her third loan request with FODEMI.  The credit will be used to expand her pig pens as she wants to buy more pigs and her current pens are small. This investment will increase business, sales and income that should improve the quality of life for her and her family.

The dream she has is to become a direct distributor of pigs.

loans.use: To grow the size of her pig pens as she wants to acquire more pigs to grow her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more kale.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es: La señora Mariela se  dedica a  la venta de golosinas, tarjetas telefónicas en una tienda de barrio en la casa de sus padres, que también funciona como una pequeña librería donde vende cuadernos, lápices, punta bolas y otros artículos de escritorio; su esposo es auxiliar contable en una empresa de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de  tarjetas de crédito  para teléfonos  celulares, más artículos de escritorio y chocolates.  Mariela   es casada y no tiene  hijos  Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona  de Achachicala  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Esta es la primera vez que recurre a una institución financiera para solicitar un préstamo y al saber de Kiva, ella decide que su solicitud sea enviada para conseguir financiamiento.
texts.en:
Mariela sells snacks and telephone charge cards in a neighborhood store located in her parents’ house which also functions as a small stationery shop selling notebooks, pencils, ball-point pens and other office supplies.  Her husband is an accounting assistant at a firm in La Paz. She needs the loan to buy mobile phone credit cards, more office supplies and chocolates.

Mariela is married and has no children.  She lives in her parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s Achachicala zone.  This is the first time she’s called on a financial institution to request a loan and learning about Kiva she’s decided that her application be sent to get financing.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es: La señora Gloria Patricia a sus 42 años de edad es madre de dos hijos de 14 y 11 años, desde hace 13 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de platos típicos de la región tales como tamales y morcilla, estos productos los distribuye en su barrio y sectores aledaños. Esta actividad, la señora Gloria Patricia la aprendió de su madre a quien le ayudaba años atrás, actualmente su esposo le ayuda con la distribución de los productos. La señora Gloria requiere de la compra de equipos para la cocina tal como ollas, una mesa de acero y un fogón que le permitan mayor comodidad y agilidad para preparar sus productos y así poder mejorar sus ingresos y con estos la calidad de vida de su familia en especial a de uno de sus hijos quien esta muy enfermo. El sueño de la señora Gloria Patricia es tener un local comercial y en este generar empleos directos.
texts.en:
Gloria Patricia, 42, is the mother of two children, ages 14 and 11.  For 13 years she has worked making and selling traditional regional dishes such as tamales and blood sausage.  She distributes these products in her neighborhood and nearby areas.  Gloria Patricia learned this work from her mother, whom she used to help years ago.  Currently her husband helps her distribute the products.

Gloria needs to buy equipment for the kitchen, such as pots, a steel table, and a stove, which will give her greater comfort and agility to prepare her products and so improve her income and, with this, the quality of life of her family, especially for one of her children who is very sick.

Gloria Patricia's dream is to have a commercial space in which to generate direct jobs.

loans.use: to buy kitchen equipment.

loans.name: Elina

texts.en: Elina is 37 years old and married to a businessman. They both have 8 children between the ages of 4 and 10. She has spent 12 years in the business of selling cassava. Elina has requested the loan to buy cassava to sell. With the profits, she will pay school fees for her children. In the future, she would like to have a vehicle to help in transporting cassava from the plantation to the marketplace.

loans.use: To buy more cassava to sell.

loans.name: Veneranda

texts.en: Veneranda is a 30-year-old widow. She has a boutique for the past 8 years. She has requested a loan to add more sugar, salt and beans to sell in her boutique. She hopes to use the profits from her business to create savings. She would like to have different marketplaces for her items in the future.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, salt and beans to sell.

loans.name: Reyna Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “REYNA DEL CARMEN”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.
