She requested this loan so that she can buy ingredients such as meats, bananas, banana leaves, raisins, and dough, among other things to make tamales.   She’s been doing this for four months.  Things have gone well for her and her household income has improved.  It was this that inspired her to start this business; as well as wanting to help her husband generate the household income so that nothing will be needed.  What she wants is to be able to continue working this small business as long as God grants her life, and in this way continue supporting her children who attend school.

The other members of the group are: Soraida, who will invest in cosmetics to resell; María, who will invest in supplies for making piñatas; and María del Carmen, who will invest in soft drinks to resell.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Nevaditas De Palcoco Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NEVADITAS DE PALCOCO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Copacabana, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Cleta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: compra y venta de ganado, venta de carne, compra de alimento para ganado, venta de arena, tejido de mantas.

La señora Cleta,  indica que es el primer ciclo que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de mantas que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de un anterior trabajo.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de La Paz y posterior a la elaboración lo venderá en la feria. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.
texts.en:
The “NEVADITAS DE PALCOCO” communal bank is starting its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the main Copacabana office. The group has ten members and is governed by a board of directors headed by Señora Cleta. The members' businesses are varied and include: buying and selling livestock; selling meat; livestock feed; sand sales; and knitting blankets.
Cleta says that this is her first cycle with Pro Mujer, and that she joined at the invitation of a promoter. She currently has a business knitting blankets. She has had this business for several years, and learned it from a previous job.
This loan is for increasing her working capital (buying wool). She will buy the wool in La Paz, and will sell her completed blankets in the market. This form of work allows her to generate an income to support her family; she is in a common-law marriage and has two children.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Martha Araceli

texts.en:
Martha is 59 years old and she is a widow. She has two daughters who are 22 and 28 years old. Martha's eldest daughter currently lives on her own. 

Martha has owned her pulpería for 15 years. She had always liked sales, so she used her savings to start the pulpería. She works 10 hours daily selling basic goods like soft-drinks, rice, beans, bread, lard, sugar, flour, toilet paper, cookies, eggs, pasta and soap. Martha's desire has always been to get ahead and better her economic situation and the pulpería is allowing her to do just that. 

With this loan of 10,000 Lempira (HNL) Martha plans on increasing her inventory with the purchase of rice, flour and soft-drinks among other items. She hopes a greater inventory will translate into higher sales and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, flour, soft-drinks and other groceries.

location.town: San Jose de Colinas, Santa Barbara

loans.name: Saray Y Responsabilidad Group

texts.en:
Teresa is a 47-year-old borrower who lives in San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic. Teresa is the coordinator for her group, Saray y Responsabilidad 1 and 4 (Saray is a biblical name and Responsabilidad means responsibility). Her story is representative of the other borrowers in the group.

Teresa lives in a neighborhood in the city of San Pedro. She lives in a simple home structure with her long term partner and their two children. She is running a small clothing and shoe sales business from her home. She also sells her merchandise on foot looking for new clients and visiting her old customers to show them new products. 

Teresa is happy that she has had access to loans for seven years. This is her 14th one. All the years and loans have brought positive changes in her life. Her family has been blessed like other members of the group. One of Teresa's dreams is to have her own very comfortable and safe house.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: 2 De Agosto Group

texts.es: Banco de emprendimiento 2 de Agosto, se encuentra en su segundo ciclo conformado por 8 integrantes que viven en la zona del kilometro 9,  cuentan con negocio y actividad propia,   la Presidenta  es la Sra. Roxana de 23 años de edad, vive en la zona del kilometro 9 hace 4 años su  actividad es la venta  de cosméticos de manera ambulante visita distintas oficinas y barrios  ofreciendo sus productos, se dedica a esta actividad hace 2 años con Estado civil convive con el sr. Freddy quien  es moto taxista y tienen 1 hijo pequeño a su cargo, con el dinero del crédito comprara cosméticos por mayor ya que estas fiestas de fin año tiene mucha demanda ya que tiene que entregar pedidos, y de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo .                                                                                                                                                                                                         Los señores están muy agradecidos con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en ellos y brindarles un apoyo, para poder crecer en sus negocios y actividades.
texts.en:
The “2nd of August” Bank of Undertaking, composed of 8 individuals who live in the zone of Kilometer 9, each with her own business or activity, is in its 2nd loan cycle. The President is Roxana, 23 years of age, who has lived in the Kilometer 9 zone for some 4 years. She sells cosmetics door to door. Roxana visits distinct offices and barrios offering her products. She has been in this activity for 2 years. Roxana is  married to Freddy who is a moto-taxi driver and they have 1 little boy in their care.

With the loan Roxana will purchase cosmetics at wholesale since end-of-the-year celebrations create much demand. She must deliver orders and to do this, she needs to increase her working capital.

The borrowers are very grateful to our organization for having confidence in them and offering aid to make it possible to grow their businesses and activities.

loans.use: buy cosmetics at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Leslie

texts.es:
Leslie, de 26 años, es una mujer amable, buena y trabajadora, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 8 y 3 años a quienes tiene a su cargo ya que su ex conviviente los abandono. Es una tarea muy ardua la que realiza pero todo lo hace para poder brindar lo mejor a sus hijos y así tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Vive en su casa propia a lado de sus hijos y su hermana. El trabajo de Leslie consiste en la venta de cuadros, de manera programada se va al penal a comprar cuadros que realizan los internos, de ahí los coloca entre sus clientes y semanal o quincenal realiza la cobranza. Es un trabajo que le esta brindando la oportunidad de poder tener un ingresos para así brindar educación y alimentación a su familia, lleva realizándolo por dos años y le esta yendo muy bien. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite disponer mucho de su tiempo, pero no siempre le fue tan fácil poder realizar su trabajo ya que al principio no sabia nada del negocio, pero poco a poco fue aprendiendo y ahora es una forma de vida lo que realiza. Espera poder seguir trabajando y seguir generando ingresos a su hogar. Mas adelante tiene en mente empezar a vender en mayor cantidad y enviar a otros lugares y distritos de la región. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de hambrea puntual como en el anterior crédito que tuvo, además se siente muy a gusto de poder trabajar con su banco comunal ya que son buenos y muy responsables.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará madera y materiales, para poder hacer más cuadros ya que esta en clases intensivas de aprendizaje y empezará a fabricarlos ella misma.
texts.en:
Leslie, 26, is a friendly, good and hardworking woman. She is a single mother of two children, 8 and 3, who are dependent on her, since her former partner abandoned them. She has to work hard, but everything she does is so she can provide the best for her children and they can have a better quality of life. She lives in her own house with her children and her sister. 

Leslie’s work consists of selling pictures. She makes scheduled visits to the prison to purchase paintings done by the inmates and then sells them to her clients on credit, collecting from them weekly or biweekly. This job earns her an income so she can provide an education and food for her family. She has been doing it for two years and it is going very well. What she likes about her work is that it allows her to schedule her own time, but it was not always so easy, because at first she knew nothing about the business, however little by little she began learning how to do it and now it is a way of life for her. She hopes to be able to continue working and generating an income for her household. In the future she is thinking of beginning to sell in greater volumes and of sending her products to other places and districts in the region.

This will be Leslie’s second loan from MFP and she hopes to have your collaboration so that she can continue to meet her goals. She is committed to making her payments on time as she did with her earlier loan. As well she is very pleased to be able to work with her communal bank, since they are good and very responsible people.

loans.use: to buy wood and materials.

loans.name: Soraida

texts.es:
La señora Soraida a sus 41 años de edad es madre de tres hijos de 20, 18 y 12 años de edad, desde sus 13 años de edad la señora Soraida aprendió el manejo de maquinas de confección en un colegio de monjas en un pueblo de Antioquia donde estudiaba. Debido a dificultades económicas la señora Soraida y sus padres tuvieron que desplazarse para la ciudad de Medellín, desde entonces la señora Soraida empezó a trabajar como operaria de maquina plana.

La señora Soraida por un tiempo paro de trabajar, pero debido a que su esposo se quedó sin trabajo retomó desde su propia casa con un pequeño taller de confección que le permite conseguir los ingresos para el sustento de su hogar. La señora Soraida requiere de la compra de insumos como hilos y telas y además realizarle mantenimiento al motor de dos de sus maquinas, que le permitan mejorar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Soraida, 41, is the mother of three sons, who are 20, 18 and 12 years of age. When she was 13 years old, Soraida learned how to operate sewing machines in a school run by nuns in a town in Antioquia, where she was studying. Due to economic difficulties, Soraida and her parents had to move to the city of Medellín, where she began to work as a flat machine operator. 

For a while Soraida stopped working however, due to her husband’s lack of employment, she has resumed working from her own home in a small workshop, which allows her to earn an income to support her household. She needs to purchase supplies, such as thread and fabric, and also to have the motors of two of her machines serviced, which will permit her to improve her income and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to service two of her sewing machines and to purchase supplies such as fabrics and thread.

loans.name: Irma Trifonia

texts.es: La  Sra. Irma, ella vive en la localidad de San Luis por mas de 8 años se dedica a la  compra  y  venta  de animales y también a la venta  de  huevo criollos,  ella entrega  huevo   a distintas tiendas de la ciudad de Santa Cruz,  los animales  lo saca a vender en la feria de animales los días sábado y domingo en la localidad de el Torno,  los otros días realiza entrega en su domicilio. El crédito lo esta solicitando para la compra de mas animales ya que tiene pedidos para estas fiestas navideñas y lo necesita comprar con tiempo para engorde ya que también es mas barato,  Convive con el señor Máximo  el se dedica al transporte,   ya que por el trabajo para siempre viajando por lugares alejado  actualmente se encuentra trabajando en la localidad  cañada 2, la Sra. Irma se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Sra. Irma lives in the settlement of San Luis. For more than eight years she has bought and sold animals and she also sells Creole eggs. She provides the eggs to different stores in the city of Santa Cruz. She takes the animals to sell in the animal street fairs on Saturdays and Sundays in El Torno settlement. Other days she makes her sales from home.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more animals since she already has orders for the Christmas holidays and she needs to buy them in time to fatten them since it is also cheaper to fatten them herself. 

She lives with Sr. Máximo who works in transportation and due to his job is always traveling to faraway places. Currently he is working in the settlement of Cañada 2. Irene is very grateful for the help provided her.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs and eggs.

loans.name: Foulbe 2 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe est créé depuis l'inauguration du BV. Il est composé de 31 femmes qui sont animées par une très grande solidarité entre entre elles. Elles mènent des activités de commerce de produits agricole et alimentaires

Madame HARY (assise en troisième position de la gauche vers la droite, emmitouflée d'une écharpe noir parsemée de points blancs)  est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 54 ans. Elle est mariée  et mère de trois enfants.

Elle achète des denrées alimentaires tels de l'huile de palme et de la pate d'arachide, etc dans la sous région qu'elle revend à la capitale

Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d’augmenter et maintenir ses activités.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’assurer les besoins familiales (habillement, santé, scolarité, nourriture).
texts.en:
The group was formed when the local village credit association was established. It is made up of 31 women who are driven by their close solidarity. They sell crops and food for a living. 

Madame Hary (sitting third from the left, covered in a black scarf with white dots) is the group leader. She is 54 years old, married and has three children. She purchases foodstuffs such as palm oil and peanut paste etc in her local area that she sells in the capital city. This new loan will enable her to boost her business.  The profits she generates will enable her to see to her family's needs (clothes, health, schooling and food).

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and peanut paste

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La señora Flor  de Luz,  vive en una localidad pequeña ella es  casada con el señor  Gilberto y con quien procreo tres hijos quienes dos ya estas fuera de su responsabilidad y una a un vive con ellos.

   Ella solcito  el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  materiales para su estética en donde lleva trabajando veintidós años nueve  meses y comenta  que le va bien  ya que con ello ha mejorado muchos sus ingresos.

   Su inspiración por esta actividad comenzó  ya que desde muy joven comenzó a practicarlo y su mama la mando a cursos  para que se prepare mejor y ve que se le está dando resultado.

  Lo que ella desea es que siga trabajando con su actividad  y el préstamo para tener sus horros y poye a su hija que esta estudiando.
texts.en: Flor de Luz lives in a small place.  She is married to Gilberto with whom she procreated three children.  She is no longer responsible for two of the children but the third still lives with them.  She requested the loan to buy materials for her beauty salon where she has worked for 22 years and nine months.  She says that it has gone well since through the business she has greatly improved her income.  Her inspiration for this business began when she started practicing her skills as a young girl.  Her mother also sent her to classes to prepare her more.  She sees that it is giving her results.  What she wants is to keep working with her business.  She also wants the loan to have some savings and support her daughter who is studying.

loans.use: to buy materials for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La señora Marina  es casada con el señor   Pedro y con quien procreo siete hijos quienes ya todos están casados.

    Ella  solito l préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  ingredientes como son: harina, queso, leche, levadura, entre otros para la elaboración de panes en donde lleva trabajando   treinta y dos  años nueve meses y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello logrado mejorar mucho sus ingresos para su hogar.

   Quien lo inspiro en esta actividad fue ella mismo ya que desde pequeña  comenzó trabajando y  desde entonces le agrado la idea de elaborar panes y así se ha estado poyando  con su familia.

  Lo que más desea es que con esta actividad y el préstamo ella pueda seguir trabajando para continuar adelante con sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Marina is married to Pedro, with whom she had seven children, all of which are already married.
She requested the loan in order to purchase supplies such as flour, cheese, baking powder, etc., for making bread. She has been in this line of work for 32 years and 9 months and she reports that it is going well, since it has allowed her to get a much better income for her home.
Her inspiration for this business was herself, because she started working when she was young and since then she has enjoyed the idea of making bread. That is the way she has supported her family.
Her biggest wish is that through this business and this loan she is able to keep on working and getting ahead with her profits.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make bread.

loans.name: Magdali

texts.es:
La señora Magdali es casada con el señor  José Ariel y con quien procreo  tres hijos quienes  a un están  a su responsabilidad.

   Ella solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de  tacos en donde lleva  trabajando  tres años y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello a mejorado mucho sus ingresos para su familia.

  Su inspiración por esta actividad comenzó ya que también  quiere apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa   y darle lo más necesario  a su familia.

   Lo que más desea es que con su pequeña actividad vaya  aumentado más y más su actividad para seguir adelante hasta que dios les preste vida.
texts.en:
Magdali is married to José Ariel and they have three children still in their care.  She asked for the loan to buy ingredients to make tacos.  She’s been working for three years and she comments that she does well since she’s improved her family’s income very much.  

Her inspiration for this activity started because she also wants to help her husband with household income and to provide what’s necessary for her family.  What she most wants is that her small activity grows more and more to continue forward as long as God grants her life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tacos.

loans.name: El Recuerdo Group

texts.es:
El grupo  se llama el Recuerdo  y se integra de  cinco señoras quien cada una se dedica as u respectiva actividad.

   Quine se le tomo la entrevista se llama  María del Rosario ella es casada con el  señor  Alfredo y con quien procreo cuatro hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad.

   Ella solcito el préstamo par invertirlo en la compra  y venta de  cosméticos de la marca a von, Fuler y Arabela, en donde lleva trabando   ocho meses y comenta que le va  bien ya  que con ello  va mejorando cada día sus ingresos para su familia.

   Su inspiración por esta actividad comenzó  por una compañera quien la animo ya que   ve que le va bien y  la animo a que también ella venda  para así apoyarse con  sus ingresos y ganar su propio dinero  para así su esposo se sienta apoyado   por ella.

   Lo que  más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad y el préstamo  que ha solicitado pueda seguir trabajando  hasta que dios le preste vida y apoyar a sus hijos.

   Quienes integran en el  grupo son las  señoras: Ana Guadalupe quien invertirá el préstamo en la compra y venta de pollos  destazados, Marlene  invertirá en la compra  y venta de cosméticos de la marca avon, Santa Ana invertirá en la compra de mercancía para su tienda de abarrotes, María  Leticia invertirá en la compra y venta de cosméticos de la marca  avon y Fuler.
texts.en:
This group is called “El Recuerdo” and is composed of five women each with her own activity.  María del Rosario was the one interviewed.  She’s married to Alfredo and they have four children still in their care.

She requested the loan to buy Avon, Fuller and Arabela brand cosmetics.  She’s been working eight months and comments that she does well because every day her income for her family is improving.

She was inspired to go into this activity by a girlfriend who encouraged her to do so since she does well and she encouraged her to sell also to help herself with income and to earn her own money so that her husband can feel supported by her.  What she most wants from this small activity and the loan she’s asked for is to be able to continue working as long as God gives her life and to support her children.

The group members are: Ana Guadalupe who will uses the loan in her butchered chicken business; Marlene who will use it in her business selling Avon cosmetics; Santa Ana who will buy merchandise for her grocery store and María Leticia who will buy Avon and Fuller brand cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Kairaba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 09 juillet 2002. Il  est  composé de onze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Alimatou qui est à la gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 40 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de six enfants. 

Elle s’active dans la vente de savon et de détergent. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This microcredit group was formed on the 9th July 2002. It is made up of eleven women who live in the same quarter. Their main line of trade is retail. 

Madame Alimatou - who is on the left of the photo with her hand raised - is the group leader. She is 40 years old, married, and has six children. She sells soap and detergent for a living. She has been successful in her line of work, in which she has been involved for several years. This loan will enable her to boost her working capital and to better develop her business. 

The profits she generates will enable her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothes etc) and to boost her savings.

loans.use: to purchase soap and detergent

loans.name: Djimountenor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 09 juillet 2002. Il  est  constitué de quinze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Georgette qui est à la gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 61 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de sept enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente d'huitres, d'huile de palme, de balais, de beignets et de pâte d'arachide. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created July 9, 2002. It consists of five women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is retail trade.

Madame Georgette (who is raising her hand at the left of the picture) is responsible for the group. She is 61 years old, married with seven children. She also takes care of two other children entrusted to her by their parents.

She is active in selling oysters, palm oil, brooms, beignets (fritters) and peanut paste. She has good experience in this area of activity, which she has exercised for several years.

This loan will bolster her capital and help her to further develop her activities.

Profits will enable her to improve family living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.), and increase her savings.

loans.use: buy oysters, palm oil, brooms, beignets (fritters) and peanut paste

loans.name: Goorgoorlu Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 09juillet 2002. Il  est  constitué de quinze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Maguette qui est à la gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 55 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge dix autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de petit déjeuner. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
Goorgoorlu Group was formed in solidarity on July 9, 2002. It consists of 15 women who live in the same neighborhood. Their primary business is shopkeeping.

Madam Maguette who is on the left of the photo raising her hand is responsible for the group. She is 55 years old. She is married and mother to three children. She also takes care of 10 other children entrusted to her by her parents.

She actively sells breakfast. She has good experience in this domain, where she has been working for several years.

This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and to better develop her business.

The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, nutrition, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy breakfast products.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: El sr. Carlos es Chapista (arreglo de movilidades, pintado) hace varios años,  vive en casa familiar en la casa de los Papás de su esposa Romelia,  el taller que tiene el cliente es en la casa de sus papás, ambos trabajan por el bienestar de su familia, desean mejorar sus ingresos , ya que desean un bienestar para sus hijos  El crédito lo invertirán en compra de algunas herramientas  para su taller de chapería y compra de equipo de sonido y algunos electrodomésticos, el  Sr. Carlos es una persona joven con ganas de superación agradecido con la institución por el trabajo brindado.
texts.en: Carlos has been a vehicle body repairman (vehicle repair and painting) for several years.  He lives in his parents’ house with his wife Romelia.  His repair shop is also located at his parents’.  They both work for their family’s wellbeing.  They hope to improve their income because they want wellbeing for their children.  They will use the loan to buy a few tools for the body shop and to buy sound equipment and some home appliances.  Carlos is a young person who very much wants to get ahead and he’s grateful to the institution for the work it’s provided.

loans.use: to buy tools for his workship and also a television set and sound equipment.
